TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pearl Hunters[COLOR_REVERT] ply the seas to provide their fellow citizens with valuable [LINK=YIELD_GEMS]Gems[\LINK]. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with [LINK=BONUS_PEARLS_2]Pearls[\LINK] will make them a Pearl Hunter. If an [LINK=UNIT_PEARLS_HUNTER]Expert Pearl Hunter[\LINK] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gems[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Îõîòíèêè çà æåì÷óæèíàìè[COLOR_REVERT] íûðÿþò âäîëü ïîáåðåæèé,÷òîáû îáåñïå÷èòü ñâîèõ ñîãðàæäàí [LINK=YIELD_GEMS]Äðàãîöåííîñòÿìè[\LINK].Íàçíà÷üòå êîëîíèñòà ðàáîòàòü íà ìîðñêîì ó÷àñòêå ñ [LINK=BONUS_PEARLS_2]Æåì÷óæèíàìè[\LINK] ÷òîá ñäåëàòü èõ îõîòíèêàìè çà ïîñëåäíèìè.Åñëè âû íàéìåòå [LINK=UNIT_PEARLS_HUNTER]Ýêñïåðòà ïî îõîòå çà æåì÷óãîì[\LINK] òî çíà÷èòåëüíî óâåëè÷èòå äîáû÷ó [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Äðàãîöåííîñòåé[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Perlensucher suchen entlang der Küste nach Perlen. Wird ein Kolonist der Arbeit auf einem Feld mit Perlen zugewiesen, wird er dadurch automaisch ein Perlensucher. Nutzen Sie wenn möglich den Erfahrene Perlensucher.
TEXT.Italian: Pearls Hunters ply the seas to provide their fellow citizens with valuable pearls. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with pearls will automatically make them a Pearls Hunter. If an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pearls Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Pearls[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Pearls Hunters ply the seas to provide their fellow citizens with valuable pearls. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with pearls will automatically make them a Pearls Hunter. If an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pearls Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Pearls[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Expert Pearl Hunters[COLOR_REVERT] ply the seas to provide their fellow citizens with [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pearls[COLOR_REVERT], which are valuable [LINK=YIELD_GEMS]Gems[\LINK]. Assigning an Expert Pearl Hunter to work a sea tile with the [LINK=BONUS_PEARLS_2]Pearls[\LINK] resource as a [LINK=PROFESSION_PEARLS_HUNTER]Pearl Hunter[\LINK] will provide 3 more Gems each turn than a regular colonist would.[PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Pearl Hunters can both be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK] and be trained by [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Natives[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_SCHOOLHOUSE]Schoolhouse[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ýêñïåðòû ïî îõîòå çà æåì÷óãîì[COLOR_REVERT] ðûùóò âäîëü ïîáåðåæèé îáåñïå÷èâàÿ ñîãðàæäàí [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Æåì÷óæèíàìè[COLOR_REVERT],êîòîðûå ïðåäñòàâëÿþò ñîáîé ïîäâèä [LINK=YIELD_GEMS]Äðàãîöåíîñòåé[\LINK]. Íàçíà÷åíèå ýêñïåðòà ïî îõîòå çà æåì÷óæèíàìè íà ìîðñêîé ó÷àñòîê ñ [LINK=BONUS_PEARLS_2]Æåì÷óãîì[\LINK] êàê [LINK=PROFESSION_PEARLS_HUNTER]Îõîòíèêà çà æåì÷óãîì[\LINK] îáåñïå÷èò â òðè ðàçà áîëüøå äðàãîöåííîñòåé çà õîä, ÷åì ìîã áû äîáûòü îáûêíîâåííûé êîëîíèñò.[PARAGRAPH:1]Ýêñïåðòîâ ïî îõîòå çà æåì÷óæèíàìè ìîæíî íàíÿòü â[LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Åâðîïå[\LINK] èëè îáó÷èòü ó [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Òóçåìöåâ[\LINK], òàêæå îíè ìîãóò áûòü [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Îáó÷åíû[\LINK] â êîëîíèÿõ ñî [LINK=BUILDING_SCHOOLHOUSE]Øêîëàìè[\LINK] èëè îäíèì èç èõ óëó÷øåíèé.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Perlensucher[COLOR_REVERT] sind Meister der Küste und des Ozeans. Sie können dort beträchtliche Mengen an [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Perlen[COLOR_REVERT] gewinnen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Pearls Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] are masters of the sea. Any ocean or coast tile they work will yield significantly more than its normal bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pearls[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Pearls Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] are masters of the sea. Any ocean or coast tile they work will yield significantly more than its normal bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pearls[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Units working in the [LINK=BUILDING_WAREHOUSE]Storage House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades can take up the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cocoa Drier[COLOR_REVERT] profession. Cocoa Driers produce [LINK=YIELD_COCOA]Cocoa[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_COCOA_FRUITS]Cocoa Pods[\LINK]. Assigning a [LINK=UNIT_FERMENTATOR]Master Drier[\LINK] to this job will generate twice as much Cocoa, as long as enough Cocoa Pods are in stock.
TEXT.French: Êîëîíèñòû ðàáîòàþùèå â [LINK=BUILDING_WAREHOUSE]Ìàãàçèíå[\LINK] èëè îäíîì èç åãî óëó÷øåíèé,ìîãóò ïîëó÷èòü ñïåöèàëüíîñòü [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Êàêàî-ñóøèòåëÿ[COLOR_REVERT].Êàêàî-ñóøèòåëè ïðîèçâîäÿò[LINK=YIELD_COCOA]Êàêàî[\LINK] èç [LINK=YIELD_COCOA_FRUITS]Ñòðó÷êîâ êàêàî[\LINK].Íàçíà÷åíèå [LINK=UNIT_FERMENTATOR]Ìàñòåðà ñóøêè[\LINK] íà ýòó ðàáîòó,ïîçâîëèò ïîëó÷àòü â äâà ðàçà áîëüøå êàêàî,ïîêà åãî ñòðó÷êè áóäóò â íàëè÷èè.
TEXT.German: Kakaotrockner trocknen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kakaofrüchte[COLOR_REVERT] zu Kakaobohnen. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Kako- u. Kaffeehändler:Kako- u. Kaffeehändler[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Le praterie possono ospitare piantagioni di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Caffè[COLOR_REVERT], se assegno il lavoro di coltivatore di Caffè ai coloni che lavorano in quelle caselle. Puoi aumentare ulteriormente la produzione di Caffè assegnando lo stesso lavoro a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]coltivatore esperto di Caffè [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Las casillas de pradera pueden dar [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Café[COLOR_REVERT] si asignáis al Colono que trabaja ahí la profesión de Plantador de Café. La cosecha aumentará sustancialmente si ponéis a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Plantador de Café experto[COLOR_REVERT] en el puesto.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Coffee Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to filling your [LINK=BUILDING_WAREHOUSE_EXPANSION]Warehouses[\LINK] with [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE_BERRIES]Coffee Berries[\LINK]. Any Coffee-producing tile they work as [LINK=PROFESSION_COFFEE_PLANTER]Coffee Planters[\LINK] will have its Coffee production doubled![PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Coffee Planters can be trained by [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Natives[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Êîôå-ôåðìåðû ýêñïåðòû[COLOR_REVERT] - ëó÷øèå ðàáî÷èå êîãäà äåëî äîõîäèò äî çàïîëíåíèÿ âàøåãî[LINK=BUILDING_WAREHOUSE_EXPANSION]Ñêëàäà[\LINK] [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE_BERRIES]Êîôå-ÿãîäàìè[\LINK].Íà ëþáûõ êîôå-ïðîèçâîäÿùèõ ó÷àñòêàõ ãäå îíè ðàáîòàþò êàê [LINK=PROFESSION_COFFEE_PLANTER]Êîôå-ôåðìåðû[\LINK] ïðîèçâîäñòâî êîôå óäâîèòñÿ![PARAGRAPH:1]Êîôå-ôåðìåðû êñïåðòû ìîãóò áûòü îáó÷åíû ó [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Òóçåìöåâ[\LINK], òàêæå îíè ìîãóò [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Îáó÷àòüñÿ[\LINK] â êîëîíèè ñ [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]Êîëëåäæåì[\LINK] èëè îäíèì èç åãî óëó÷øåíèé.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Kaffeepflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] verdoppeln den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kaffeefrücht[COLOR_REVERT]ertrag jedes Geländefelds, auf dem sie arbeiten.
TEXT.Italian: I [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]coltivatori esperti di Caffè[COLOR_REVERT] Raddoppiano infatti la quantità di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Caffè[COLOR_REVERT] prodotta dalla casella in cui lavorano.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Plantadores de Café expertos[COLOR_REVERT] produce el doble de cantidad de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Café[COLOR_REVERT] en cualquier casilla en la que trabaje.

TEXT.English: [LINK=TERRAIN_SAVANNAH]Savannah[\LINK] tiles can yield [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE_BERRIES]Coffee Berries[\LINK] if the colonist working them is assigned to the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee Planter[COLOR_REVERT] profession. Your harvests of Coffee Berries can be significantly increased by assigning an [LINK=UNIT_COFFEE_PLANTER]Expert Coffee Planter[\LINK] to the job.
TEXT.French: Ó÷àñòêè[LINK=TERRAIN_SAVANNAH]Ñàâàííû[\LINK] ìîãóò ïðîèçâîäèòü [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE_BERRIES]Êîôå-ÿãîäû[\LINK] åñëè êîëîíèñòó ðàáîòàþùåìó íà íèõ ïðèñâîèòü äîëæíîñòü [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Êîôå-ôåðìåðà[COLOR_REVERT].Óðîæàé êîôåéíûõ ÿãîä ìîæíî çíà÷èòåëüíî óâåëè÷èòü íàíÿâ[LINK=UNIT_COFFEE_PLANTER]Êîôå-ôåðìåðà ýêñïåðòà[\LINK] íà ýòó ðàáîòó.
TEXT.German: Savanne-Geländefelder können [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kaffeefrüchte[COLOR_REVERT] hervorbringen, wenn dem dort arbeitenden Kolonisten der Kaffeepflanzerberuf zugewiesen wurde. Ihre Kaffeeernte kann erheblich gesteigert werden, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Kaffeepflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Le praterie possono ospitare piantagioni di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Caffè[COLOR_REVERT], se assegno il lavoro di coltivatore di Caffè ai coloni che lavorano in quelle caselle. Puoi aumentare ulteriormente la produzione di Caffè assegnando lo stesso lavoro a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]coltivatore esperto di Caffè [COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Las casillas de pradera pueden dar [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Café[COLOR_REVERT] si asignáis al Colono que trabaja ahí la profesión de Plantador de Café. La cosecha aumentará sustancialmente si ponéis a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Plantador de Café experto[COLOR_REVERT] en el puesto.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Driers[COLOR_REVERT] are proficient in drying [LINK=YIELD_COCOA_FRUITS]Cocoa Pods[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE_BERRIES]Coffee Berries[\LINK] to make [LINK=YIELD_COCOA]Cocoa[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE]Coffee[\LINK] out of them. When assigned to the [LINK=PROFESSION_COCOA_DRIER]Cocoa Drier[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_COFFEE_DRIER]Coffee Drier[\LINK] profession, they are capable of turning out double the amount of both resources in the same amount of time it would take a regular colonist to create it.[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Driers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ìàñòåð ñóøèëüùèê[COLOR_REVERT] çàíèìàåòñÿ ñóøêîé [LINK=YIELD_COCOA_FRUITS]Êàêàî-áîáîâ[\LINK] è [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE_BERRIES]Êîôåéíûõ ÿãîä[\LINK] ïðîèçâîäÿ [LINK=YIELD_COCOA]Êàêàî[\LINK] è [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE]Êîôå[\LINK].Êîãäà âìåñòî îáû÷íîãî êîëîíèñòà íàçíà÷àþòñÿ [LINK=PROFESSION_COCOA_DRIER]Êàêàî-ñóøèëüùèê[\LINK] èëè [LINK=PROFESSION_COFFEE_DRIER]Êîôå-ñóøèëüùèê[\LINK], êîëè÷åñòâî ïðîèçâîäèìîãî òîâàðà óäâàèâàåòñÿ.[PARAGRAPH:1]Ìàñòåðà ñóøêè ìîãóò áûòü íàíÿòû â [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Åâðîïå[\LINK], òàêæå èõ ìîæíî [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Îáó÷èòü[\LINK] â êîëîíèè ñ [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]Êîëëåäæåì[\LINK] èëè îäíèì èç åãî óëó÷øåíèé.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Kako- u. Kaffeehändler:Kako- u. Kaffeehändler[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kaffeefrüchte[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kakaorüchte[COLOR_REVERT] in getrockneten Kaffee bzw. Kakao, wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Fermentators[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee or cocoa[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee or cocoa beans[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Fermentators[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee or cocoa[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee or cocoa beans[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Units working in the [LINK=BUILDING_WAREHOUSE]Storage House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades can take up the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Coffee Drier[COLOR_REVERT] profession. Coffee Driers produce [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE]Coffee[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE_BERRIES]Coffee Berries[\LINK]. Assigning a [LINK=UNIT_FERMENTATOR]Master Drier[\LINK] to this job will generate twice as much Coffee, as long as enough Coffee Berries are in stock.
TEXT.French: Êîëîíèñòû ðàáîòàþùèå â [LINK=BUILDING_WAREHOUSE]Ìàãàçèíå[\LINK] èëè îäíîì èç åãî óëó÷øåíèé,ìîãóò ïîëó÷èòü ñïåöèàëüíîñòü [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Êîôå-ñóøèëüùèêà[COLOR_REVERT].Êîôå-ñóøèëüùèêè ïðîèçâîäÿò[LINK=YIELD_COCOA]Êîôå[\LINK] èç [LINK=YIELD_COCOA_FRUITS]Êîôå-ÿãîä[\LINK].Íàçíà÷åíèå [LINK=UNIT_FERMENTATOR]Ìàñòåðà ñóøêè[\LINK] íà ýòó ðàáîòó,ïîçâîëèò ïîëó÷àòü â äâà ðàçà áîëüøå êîôå,åñòåñòâåííî ïîêà êîôå-ÿãîäû áóäóò â íàëè÷èè.
TEXT.German: Kaffeetrockner trocknen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kaffeefrüchte[COLOR_REVERT] zu Rohkaffee. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Kaffeetrockner[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Coffee Driers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee beans[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Coffee Driers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coffee beans[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hunters[COLOR_REVERT] are much more effective in exercising the [LINK=PROFESSION_HUNTER]Hunter[\LINK] profession than other colonists. The profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is especially profitable on special Bonus Resources like [LINK=BONUS_BISON]Bisons[\LINK] or [LINK=BONUS_DEER]Deer[\LINK]. Hunters produce both [LINK=YIELD_FUR]Fur[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_FOOD]Food[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Hunters can both be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK] and be trained by [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Natives[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_SCHOOLHOUSE]Schoolhouse[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Îõîòíèêè ýêñïåðòû[COLOR_REVERT] ãîðàçäî ýôôåêòèâíåå [LINK=PROFESSION_HUNTER]Îõîòÿòñÿ[\LINK] ÷åì èíûå êîëîíèñòû.Ïðîôåññèÿ [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Îõîòíèêà[COLOR_REVERT] îñîáåííî ïðèáûëüíà íà ñïåöèàëüíûõ ó÷àñòêàõ ñ áîíóñàìè,òàêèìè êàê [LINK=BONUS_BISON]Çóáð[\LINK] èëè [LINK=BONUS_DEER]Îëåíü[\LINK]. Îõîòíèêè ïðîèçâîäÿò îäíîâðåìåííî è [LINK=YIELD_FUR]Ìåõ[\LINK] è [LINK=YIELD_FOOD]Åäó[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]Îõîòíèêà ýêñïåðòà ìîæíî íàíÿòü è â [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Åâðîïå[\LINK] è îáó÷èòü ó [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Èíäåéöåâ[\LINK], òàêæå îíè ìîãóò áûòü [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Íàòðåíèðîâàíû[\LINK] â êîëîíèÿõ ñ [LINK=BUILDING_SCHOOLHOUSE]Øêîëîé[\LINK] èëè îäíèì èç åå óëó÷øåíèé.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Jäger[COLOR_REVERT] sind im Beruf [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jäger[COLOR_REVERT] viel effektiver als andere Kolonisten. Dieser Beruf ist auf bestimmten Bonus-Ressourcen besonders profitabel, wie z.B. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Büffel[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hirschen[COLOR_REVERT] ausgeübt werden und erzeugt sowohl [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Felle[COLOR_REVERT], wie auch [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nahrung[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hunters [COLOR_REVERT] are much more effektive in profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] than other colonists. The profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is especially profitable on special Bonus-Ressources like [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buffalo[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT] and produces both Fur and Food.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hunters [COLOR_REVERT] are much more effektive in profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] than other colonists. The profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is especially profitable on special Bonus-Ressources like [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buffalo[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT] and produces both Fur and Food.

TEXT.English: A unit working on a [LINK=TERRAIN_TUNDRA]Tundra[\LINK] or [LINK=TERRAIN_SNOW]Permafrost[\LINK] tile or a tile with [LINK=FEATURE_FOREST]Forest[\LINK], [LINK=FEATURE_FOREST_TUNDRA]Taiga[\LINK] or a Fur-producing Bonus Resource can take up the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] profession. Hunters produce both [LINK=YIELD_FUR]Furs[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_FOOD]Food[\LINK] for your colony, though the amount of Food produced is significantly less than the amount of Fur produced. The masters of this craft are [LINK=UNIT_HUNTER]Expert Hunters[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about methods of Food-production, see [LINK=CONCEPT_FOOD]Food[\LINK].
TEXT.French: Êîëîíèñò ðàáîòàþùèé íà ó÷àñòêàõ ñ [LINK=TERRAIN_TUNDRA]Òóíäðîé[\LINK] èëè [LINK=TERRAIN_SNOW]Ìåðçëîòîé[\LINK], íà ó÷àñòêàõ ñ [LINK=FEATURE_FOREST]Ëåñîì[\LINK], [LINK=FEATURE_FOREST_TUNDRA]Òàéãîé[\LINK] èëè áîíóñîì ê äîáû÷å ìåõà, ìîæåò âçÿòü ñïåöèàëüíîñòü [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Îõîòíèêà[COLOR_REVERT].Îõîòíèêè ïðîèçâîäÿò è [LINK=YIELD_FUR]Ìåõà[\LINK] è [LINK=YIELD_FOOD]Åäó[\LINK] äëÿ èõ êîëîíèé, õîòÿ îáüåì ïîëó÷åííîãî ïðîäîâîëüñòâèÿ áóäåò ìåíüøå íåæåëè îáüåì ìåõîâ. Ìàñòåðà ýòîãî ðåìåñëà íàçûâàþòñÿ [LINK=UNIT_HUNTER]Îõîòíèêàìè ýêñïåðòàìè[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]Äëÿ ïîëó÷åíèÿ äîïîëíèòåëüíîé èíôîðìàöèè î ìåòîäàõ ïðîèçâîäñòâà ïðîäîâîëüñòâèÿ, ïðîõîäèòå ïî ññûëêå - [LINK=CONCEPT_FOOD]Åäà[\LINK].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Jäger[COLOR_REVERT] sind im Beruf [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jäger[COLOR_REVERT] viel effektiver als andere Kolonisten. Dieser Beruf ist auf bestimmten Bonus-Ressourcen besonders profitabel, wie z.B. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Büffel[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hirschen[COLOR_REVERT] ausgeübt werden und erzeugt sowohl [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Felle[COLOR_REVERT], wie auch [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nahrung[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hunters [COLOR_REVERT] are much more effektive in profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] than other colonists. The profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is especially profitable on special Bonus-Ressources like [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buffalo[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT] and produces both Fur and Food.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hunters [COLOR_REVERT] are much more effektive in profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] than other colonists. The profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is especially profitable on special Bonus-Ressources like [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buffalo[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT] and produces both Fur and Food.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Seal Hunters[COLOR_REVERT] are masters of the Coast and the Sea. Any tile with the [LINK=BONUS_SEALS]Seals[\LINK] or [LINK=BONUS_WALRUSS]Walrusses[\LINK] Bonus they work as [LINK=PROFESSION_SEAL_HUNTER]Seal Hunter[\LINK] will yield significantly more than its normal bounty of [LINK=YIELD_FUR]Fur[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_FOOD]Food[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Seal Hunters can be trained by [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Natives[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Îõîòíèêè íà òþëåíåé ýêñïåðòû[COLOR_REVERT] ðàáîòàþò íà ïîáåðåæüÿõ è â ìîðå.Íà ëþáîì ó÷àñòêå ñ [LINK=BONUS_SEALS]Òþëåíÿìè[\LINK] èëè [LINK=BONUS_WALRUSS]Ìîðæàìè[\LINK] [LINK=PROFESSION_SEAL_HUNTER]Îõîòíèêè íà òþëåíåé[\LINK] äîáóäóò çíà÷èòåëüíî áîëüøå [LINK=YIELD_FUR]Ìåõà[\LINK] è [LINK=YIELD_FOOD]Åäû[\LINK] ÷åì êîëîíèñòû.[PARAGRAPH:1]Îõîòíèêè íà òþëåíåé ýêñïåðòû ìîãóò áûòü îáó÷åíû ó [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Òóçåìöåâ[\LINK], èëè æå [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Íàòðåíèðîâàíû[\LINK] â êîëîíèè ñ [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]Êîëëåäæåì[\LINK] ëèáî îäíèì èç åãî óëó÷øåíèé.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Seelöwenjäger[COLOR_REVERT] sind Meister der Küste und des Ozeans. Sie können auf den Bonusressourcen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seelöwen[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Walrösser[COLOR_REVERT] beträchtliche Mengen an [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fellen[COLOR_REVERT] gewinnen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Seal Hunters[COLOR_REVERT] are masters of the coast and the sea. Any tile with bonus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seals[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Walruss[COLOR_REVERT] they work will yield significantly more than its normal bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Seal Hunters[COLOR_REVERT] are masters of the coast and the sea. Any tile with bonus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seals[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Walruss[COLOR_REVERT] they work will yield significantly more than its normal bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seal Hunters[COLOR_REVERT] hunt along the coast to provide their fellow citizens with [LINK=YIELD_FOOD]Food[\LINK] and to acquire the valuable [LINK=YIELD_FUR]Furs[\LINK]. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with bonus [LINK=BONUS_SEALS]Seals[\LINK] or [LINK=BONUS_WALRUSS]Walrusses[\LINK] will automatically make them a Seal Hunter. If an [LINK=UNIT_SEALS_HUNTER]Expert Seal Hunter[\LINK] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of Fur and Food.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about methods of Food-production, see [LINK=CONCEPT_FOOD]Food[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seal Hunters[COLOR_REVERT] hunt along the coast to provide their fellow citizens with [LINK=YIELD_FOOD]Food[\LINK] and to acquire the valuable [LINK=YIELD_FUR]Furs[\LINK]. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with bonus [LINK=BONUS_SEALS]Seals[\LINK] or [LINK=BONUS_WALRUSS]Walrusses[\LINK] will automatically make them a Seal Hunter. If an [LINK=UNIT_SEALS_HUNTER]Expert Seal Hunter[\LINK] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of Fur and Food.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about methods of Food-production, see [LINK=CONCEPT_FOOD]Food[\LINK].
TEXT.German: Seelöwenjäger jagen entlang der Küste und auf dem ewigen Eis um ihre Mitbürger mit Nahrung zu versorgen und um wertvolle Felle zu erbeuten. Wird ein Kolonist der Arbeit auf einer Bonusressource Seelöwen zugewiesen, so wird er automatisch Seelüwenjäger. Wird dieser Beruf einem [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Seelüwenjäger[COLOR_REVERT] zugewiesen, so verdoppelt sich der Ertrag an [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fellen[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: Seal Hunters hunt along the coast to provide their fellow citizens with food and to acquire the valuable furs. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with bonus Seals will automatically make them a Seal Hunter. If an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Exp. Seal Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Seal Hunters hunt along the coast to provide their fellow citizens with food and to acquire the valuable furs. Assigning a colonist to work a sea tile with bonus Seals will automatically make them a Seal Hunter. If an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Exp. Seal Hunter[COLOR_REVERT] is assigned to this profession, you will receive an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to planting [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] and getting huge amounts harvested from those. Any Hemp-producing tile they work will have its production doubled!
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Êîíîïëÿíûå ôåðìåðû ýêñïåðòû[COLOR_REVERT] - ëó÷øèå ðàáîòíèêè êîãäà äåëî äîõîäèò äî ïîñàäêè [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Êîíîïëè[COLOR_REVERT] è ïîëó÷åíèÿ îãðîìíûõ ïðèáûëåé ñ ýòîãî. Ëþáîé ó÷àñòîê ñ êîíîïëåé íà êîòîðîì îíè ðàáîòàþò âûðàáàòûâàåò âäâîå áîëüøå ïðîäóêöèè!
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Hanfpflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] sind die besten Arbeiter, wenn es darum geht, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] anzubauen und große Mengen dieses Rohstoffs zu ernten. Die Produktion an Hanf eines Geländefelds wird verdoppelt, wenn sie darauf arbeiten!
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to planting [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] and getting huge amounts harvested from those. Any Hemp-producing tile they work will have its production doubled!
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to planting [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] and getting huge amounts harvested from those. Any Hemp-producing tile they work will have its production doubled!

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are specialist in cultivating [LINK=YIELD_HEMP]Hemp[\LINK], the Raw Material for [LINK=YIELD_ROPE]Ropes[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_SAILCLOTH]Sailcloth[\LINK]. When employed as [LINK=PROFESSION_HEMP_PLANTER]Hemp Planters[\LINK], they produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] from any tile they work.[PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Hemp Planters can be trained by [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Natives[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Êîíîïëÿíûå ôåðìåðû ýêñïåðòû[COLOR_REVERT] ÿâëÿþòñÿ ñïåöèàëèñòàìè â âûðàùèâàíèè [LINK=YIELD_HEMP]Êîíîïëè[\LINK], ñûðüÿ äëÿ [LINK=YIELD_ROPE]Êàíàòîâ[\LINK] è [LINK=YIELD_SAILCLOTH]Ïàðóñèíû[\LINK]. Ïðè íàéìå [LINK=PROFESSION_HEMP_PLANTER]Êîíîïëÿíûõ ôåðìåðîâ[\LINK], ìîæíî ïîëó÷èòü â äâà ðàçà áîëüøå [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Êîíîïëè[COLOR_REVERT] ñ ëþáîãî ó÷àñòêà.[PARAGRAPH:1]Êîíîïëÿíûå ôåðìåðû ýêñïåðòû ìîãóò áûòü íàòðåíèðîâàíû ó [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Òóçåìöåâ[\LINK], à òàêæå [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Îáó÷åíû[\LINK] â êîëîíèè ñ [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]Êîëëåäæåì[\LINK] èëè îäíèì èç åãî óëó÷øåíèé.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Hanfpflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] sind die besten Arbeiter, wenn es darum geht, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] anzubauen und große Mengen dieses Rohstoffs zu ernten. Die Produktion an Hanf eines Geländefelds wird verdoppelt, wenn sie darauf arbeiten!
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to planting [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] and getting huge amounts harvested from those. Any Hemp-producing tile they work will have its production doubled!
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are the finest workers available when it comes to planting [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT] and getting huge amounts harvested from those. Any Hemp-producing tile they work will have its production doubled!

TEXT.English: When assigning a citizen to work a [LINK=TERRAIN_GRASS]Grassland[\LINK] tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp Planter[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [LINK=YIELD_HEMP]Hemp[\LINK]. By assigning an [LINK=UNIT_HEMP_PLANTER]Expert Hemp Planter[\LINK] to this profession, your stores will brim over with Hemp!
TEXT.French: Ïðè íàçíà÷åíèèè ãðàæäàíèíà íà ðàáîòó â [LINK=TERRAIN_GRASS]Ëóãàõ[\LINK], âû ìîæåòå äàòü åìó ñïåöèàëüíîñòü [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Êîíîïëÿíîãî ôåðìåðà[COLOR_REVERT], ñ êîòîðîé îí îáåñïå÷èò âàøó êîëîíèþ [LINK=YIELD_HEMP]Êîíîïëåé[\LINK].Íàçíà÷èâ [LINK=UNIT_HEMP_PLANTER]Îïûòíîãî êîíîïëÿíîãî ôåðìåðà[\LINK] íà ýòó äîëæíîñòü âû çàñûïèòå âàøè ìàãàçèíû êîíîïëåé!
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie einen Bürger anweisen, ein Ebenen-Geländefeld zu bearbeiten, können Sie sich entscheiden, diesen Kolonisten den Beruf [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanfpflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] zuzuweisen, wodurch Ihre Siedlung eine Menge [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] erhält. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Hanfpflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, werden Ihre Lagerhäuser vor Hanf überquellen!
TEXT.Italian: When assigning a citizen to work a plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp Planter[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planter[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with Hemp!
TEXT.Spanish: When assigning a citizen to work a plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp Planter[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Hemp Planter[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with Hemp!

TEXT.English: If you need shiploads of [LINK=YIELD_ROPE]Ropes[\LINK] to build more Ships, then the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Roper[COLOR_REVERT] is your best friend. When employed as a [LINK=PROFESSION_ROPES_MAKER]Roper[\LINK], this specialist can create double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [LINK=YIELD_HEMP]Hemp[\LINK]in the same amount of time as an average colonist.[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Ropers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: Åñëè âàì íóæíà óéìà [LINK=YIELD_ROPE]Êàíàòîâ[\LINK] ÷òîáû ïîñòðîèòü áîëüøå êîðàáëåé, òîãäà [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Îïûòíûé êàíàòîäåë[COLOR_REVERT] âàø ëó÷øèé äðóã.Ïðè íàçíà÷åíèè [LINK=PROFESSION_ROPES_MAKER]Êàíàòîäåëà[\LINK], âûïóñê [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Êàíàòîâ[COLOR_REVERT] èç [LINK=YIELD_HEMP]Êîíîïëè[\LINK] óäâàèâàåòñÿ, â îòëè÷èè îò âîçìîæíîñòåé îáû÷íîãî êîëîíèñòà.[PARAGRAPH:1]Îïûòíîãî êàíàòîäåëà ìîæíî íàíÿòü â [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Åâðîïå[\LINK], à òàêæå [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Îáó÷èòü[\LINK] â êîëîíèè ñ [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]Êîëëåäæåì[\LINK] èëè îäíèì èç åãî óëó÷øåíèé.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Seilmacher[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seile[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Ropers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Ropers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Ropers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Îïûòíûé êàíàòîäåë[COLOR_REVERT] ïðîèçâîäèò â äâà ðàçà áîëüøå [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Êàíàòîâ[COLOR_REVERT] èç [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Êîíîïëè[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Seilmacher[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seile[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Ropers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Ropers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ropers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [LINK=YIELD_ROPE]Ropes[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_HEMP]Hemp[\LINK]. They can do this in buildings like the [LINK=BUILDING_LANDING_STAGE]Pier[\LINK] or one of its upgrades. The most effective units for this craft are [LINK=UNIT_ROPES_MAKER]Master Ropers[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ropers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [LINK=YIELD_ROPE]Ropes[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_HEMP]Hemp[\LINK]. They can do this in buildings like the [LINK=BUILDING_LANDING_STAGE]Pier[\LINK] or one of its upgrades. The most effective units for this craft are [LINK=UNIT_ROPES_MAKER]Master Ropers[\LINK].
TEXT.German: Seilmacher produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Seile[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess finden meist in Gebäuden der Hafengegend statt und ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Seilmacher[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ropers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT]. They can do so in the Docks and Harbours.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ropers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ropes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT]. They can do so in the Docks and Harbours.

TEXT.English: If you need a lot of [LINK=YIELD_SAILCLOTH]Sailcloth[\LINK] fast, the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Sailmaker[COLOR_REVERT] can be of great help. In the [LINK=PROFESSION_SAILCLOTH_MAKER]Sailmaker[\LINK] profession, he is capable of creating double the amount of these resources as regular colonists would from [LINK=YIELD_HEMP]Hemp[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Sailmakers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: Åñëè âàì íóæíî ìíîãî [LINK=YIELD_SAILCLOTH]Ïàðóñèíû[\LINK] è áûñòðî,[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Îïûòíûé ïàðóñîäåë[COLOR_REVERT] ìîæåò çäîðîâî ïîìî÷ü.Â äîëæíîñòè [LINK=PROFESSION_SAILCLOTH_MAKER]Ïàðóñîäåëà[\LINK], îí ñïîñîáåí ñîçäàòü â äâà ðàçà áîëüøå ïðîäóêöèèè èç [LINK=YIELD_HEMP]Êîíîïëè[\LINK] ÷åì îáû÷íûé êîëîíèñò.[PARAGRAPH:1]Îïûòíîãî ïàðóñîäåëà ìîæíî íàíÿòü â [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Åâðîïå[\LINK], òàêæå îí ìîæåò áûòü [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Îáó÷åí[\LINK] â êîëîíèè ñ [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]Êîëëåäæåì[\LINK] èëè îäíèì èç åãî óëó÷øåíèé.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Segeltuchmacher[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Segeltuch[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Sailmakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sailcloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Sailmakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sailcloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Sailmakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sailcloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Îïûòíûé ïàðóñîäåë[COLOR_REVERT] ïðîèçâîäèò âäâîå áîëüøå [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ïàðóñèíû[COLOR_REVERT] èç [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Êîíîïëè[COLOR_REVERT] çà õîä.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Segeltuchmacher[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Segeltuch[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Sailmakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sailcloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Sailmakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sailcloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sailmakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [LINK=YIELD_SAILCLOTH]Sailcloth[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_HEMP]Hemp[\LINK]. They can do this in buildings like the [LINK=BUILDING_DOCK]Dock[\LINK] or one of its upgrades. The most effective units for this craft are [LINK=UNIT_SAILCLOTH_MAKER]Master Sailmakers[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ïàðóñîäåëû[COLOR_REVERT] ïðîèçâîäÿò [LINK=YIELD_SAILCLOTH]Ïàðóñèíó[\LINK] èç [LINK=YIELD_HEMP]Êîíîïëè[\LINK].Çàíèìàòüñÿ ýòèì îíè ìîãóò â [LINK=BUILDING_DOCK]Äîêàõ[\LINK] èëè â îäíîì èç èõ óëó÷øåíèÿõ.Íàèáîëåå ýôôåêòèâíûé ðàáî÷èé äëÿ ýòîãî ïðîèçâîäñòâà - [LINK=UNIT_SAILCLOTH_MAKER]Îïûòíûé ïàðóñîäåë[\LINK].
TEXT.German: Segeltuchmacher verarbeiten [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hanf[COLOR_REVERT] in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Segeltuch[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess finden meist in Gebäuden der Hafengegend statt und ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Seilmacher[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sailmakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sailcloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT]. They can do so in the Docks and Harbours.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sailmakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sailcloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hemp[COLOR_REVERT]. They can do so in the Docks and Harbours.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Indigo Planters[COLOR_REVERT] are specialized in maintaining [LINK=BONUS_INDIGO]Indigo Shrubs[\LINK] and harvesting precious [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Indigo[\LINK] from them. Assigning an Expert Indigo Planter to the [LINK=PROFESSION_INDIGO_PLANTER]Indigo Planter[\LINK] profession will double the amount of [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Indigo[\LINK] you receive from that tile.[PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Indigo Planters can be trained by [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Natives[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Îïûòíûå èíäèãî-ôåðìåðû [COLOR_REVERT] ñïåöèàëèçèðóþòñÿ íà óõîäå çà [LINK=BONUS_INDIGO]Êóñòàìè èíäèãî[\LINK] è ñáîðå äðàãîöåííûõ [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Èíäèãî[\LINK] ñ íèõ. Íàçíà÷èâ îïûòíîãî èíäèãî-ôåðìåðà [LINK=PROFESSION_INDIGO_PLANTER]Èíäèãî-ôåðìåðîì[\LINK] ìîæíî óäâîèòü êîëëè÷åñòâî [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Èíäèãî[\LINK] êîòîðûå âû ïîëó÷àåòå ñ ó÷àñòêà.[PARAGRAPH:1]Îïûòíûå èíäèãî-ôåðìåðû ìîãóò áûòü íàòðåíèðîâàíû ó [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Òóçåìöåâ[\LINK], à òàêæå [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Îáó÷åíû[\LINK] â êîëîíèè ñ [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]Êîëëåäæåì[\LINK] èëè îäíèì èç åãî óëó÷øåíèé.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Indigopflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] sind die besten Arbeiter, wenn es darum geht, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT] anzupflanzen. Die Indigoproduktion jedes Indigo produzierenden Geländefelds wird verdoppelt, wenn sie darauf arbeiten!
TEXT.Italian: I [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]coltivatori esperti di indicado[COLOR_REVERT] sono i migliori lavoratori disponibili, quando si tratta di ottenere grandi raccolti di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]indicado[COLOR_REVERT]. Ogni casella produttrice di indicado in cui lavorano raddoppia la produzione!
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Plantadores de indigo expertos[COLOR_REVERT] son los mejores trabajadores disponibles cuando se trata de obtener una copiosa recolecta de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Cualquier casilla en la que trabajen y produzca indigo doblará su producción de éste.

TEXT.English: When assigning a citizen to work a [LINK=TERRAIN_PLAINS]Prairie[\LINK] tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo Planter[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Indigo[\LINK]. By assigning an [LINK=UNIT_INDIGO_PLANTER]Expert Indigo Planter[\LINK] to this profession, your stores will brim with Indigo!
TEXT.French: Ïðè íàçíà÷åíèè ãðàæäàíèíà íà ðàáîòó â [LINK=TERRAIN_PLAINS]Ïðåðèþ[\LINK], âû ìîæåòå âûáðàòü åìó ñïåöèàëüíîñòü [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Èíäèãî-ôåðìåðà[COLOR_REVERT], êîòîðàÿ îáåñïå÷èò âàøó êîëîíèþ [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Èíäèãî[\LINK].Íàçíà÷èâ [LINK=UNIT_INDIGO_PLANTER]Îïûòíîãî èíäèãî-ôåðìåðà[\LINK] íà ýòó ðàáîòó, âû çàâàëèòå âàøè ìàãàçèíû èíäèãî äî êðàåâ!
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie einen Bürger anweisen, ein Ebenen-Geländefeld zu bearbeiten, können Sie sich entscheiden, diesen Kolonisten dem Indigopflanzerberuf zuzuweisen, wodurch Ihre Siedlung eine Menge [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT] erhält. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Indigopflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, werden Ihre Lagerhäuser vor Indigo überquellen!
TEXT.Italian: Quando mandi un cittadino a lavorare caselle di pianure, puoi decidere di fargli svolgere la professione di coltivatore di indicado, che procurerà alla tua colonia un ricco raccolto di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indicado[COLOR_REVERT]. Assegnando questa professione a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]coltivatore esperto di indicado[COLOR_REVERT], riempirai i tuoi magazzini di oro !
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando asignéis a un ciudadano a trabajar en una casilla de llanura, podéis hacer que adopte la profesión de Plantador de indigo, que proporcionará a vuestra colonia una buena cantidad de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Al asignar a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Plantador de indigo experto[COLOR_REVERT] este cometido, vuestras reservas rebosarán de este preciado material.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] are very proficient in making valuable [LINK=YIELD_COLOURED_CLOTH]Coloured Cloth[\LINK], like the Colonial Flags that will soon fly over every one of your colonies. These specialists are capable of creating double the number of Coloured Cloth from [LINK=YIELD_CLOTH]Cloth[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Indigo[\LINK] in the same amount of time as a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Free Colonist[COLOR_REVERT] would, when assigned to the [LINK=PROFESSION_DYER]Dyer[\LINK] profession.Coloured Cloth is the most valuable good in Europe other than [LINK=YIELD_GEMS]Gems[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_GOLD]Gold[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Dyers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Îïûòíûé êðàñèëüùèê[COLOR_REVERT] âåñüìà ýôôåêòèâåí â ñîçäàíèè öåííûõ [LINK=YIELD_COLOURED_CLOTH]Öâåòíûõ òêàíåé[\LINK], òàêèõ êàê êîëîíèàëüíûå ôëàãè,êîòîðûå âñêîðå âîâîñþ áóäóò ðàçâåâàòüñÿ íàä âàøèìè ïîñåëåíèÿìè.Ýòè ñïåöèàëèñòû ñïîñîáíû óäâîèòü êîëè÷åñòâî ïðîèçâîäèìîé öâåòíîé òêàíè èç [LINK=YIELD_CLOTH]Òêàíè[\LINK] è [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Èíäèãî[\LINK] çà òî æå âðåìÿ ÷òî è [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ñâîáîäíûé êîëîíèñò[COLOR_REVERT] íàçíà÷åííûé [LINK=PROFESSION_DYER]Êðàñèëüùèêîì[\LINK].Öâåòíàÿ òêàíü îäèí èç íàèáîëåå öåííûõ òîâàðîâ â Åâðîïå,çà èñêëþ÷åíèåì [LINK=YIELD_GEMS]Äðàãîöåííîñòåé[\LINK] è [LINK=YIELD_GOLD]Çîëîòà[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]Îïûòíûé êðàñèëüùèê ìîæåò áûòü íàíÿò â [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Åâðîïå[\LINK], à òàêæå [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Îáó÷åí[\LINK] â êîëîíèè ñ [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]Êîëëåäæåì[\LINK] èëè îäíèì èç åãî óëó÷øåíèé.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Färber[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele Stoffe und Indigo in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gefärbte Stoffe[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Colourded Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from Cloth and Indigo.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Colourded Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from Cloth and Indigo.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Colourded Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from Cloth and Indigo.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Îïûòíûå êðàñèëüùèêè[COLOR_REVERT] ïðîèçâîäÿò â äâà ðàçà áîëüøå [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Öâåòíîé òêàíè[COLOR_REVERT] èç ñóêíà è èíäèãî.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Färber[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele Stoffe und Indigo in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gefärbte Stoffe[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Colourded Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from Cloth and Indigo.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Colourded Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from Cloth and Indigo.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dyers House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings suitable for dyeing cloth. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_DYER]Dyer[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_COLOURED_CLOTH]Coloured Cloth[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_CLOTH]Cloth[\LINK] by using [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Indigo[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_DYER]Master Dyers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_DYERY]Dyery[\LINK].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dyers House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings suitable for dyeing cloth. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_DYER]Dyer[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_COLOURED_CLOTH]Coloured Cloth[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_CLOTH]Cloth[\LINK] by using [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Indigo[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_DYER]Master Dyers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_DYERY]Dyery[\LINK].
TEXT.German: [TAB]Das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Haus des Färbers[COLOR_REVERT] ist das niedrigeste Level der Gebäudekette zur Herstellung von gefärbten Stoffen. Kolonisten mit dem Beruf Färber produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]gefärbte Stoffe[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stoffen[COLOR_REVERT] durch den Gebrauch von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Der Einsatz eines [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister-Färbers[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht die Produktion noch einmal drastisch.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dyers House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for dyeing cloth. Colonists with profession Dyer produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] by using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dyery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings suitable for dyeing cloth. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_DYER]Dyer[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_COLOURED_CLOTH]Coloured Cloth[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_CLOTH]Cloth[\LINK] by using [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Indigo[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_DYER]Master Dyers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_LARGE_DYERY]Large Dyery[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [TAB][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Êðàñèëüíÿ[COLOR_REVERT] ýòî ïðîìåæóòî÷íûé óðîâåíü çäàíèé ïðèãîäíûõ äëÿ ïîñêðàñêè òêàíåé.Êîëîíèñòû ñ ïðîôåññèåé [LINK=PROFESSION_DYER]Êðàñèëüùèêà[\LINK] ïðîèçâîäÿò [LINK=YIELD_COLOURED_CLOTH]Öâåòíóþ òêàíü[\LINK] èç [LINK=YIELD_CLOTH]Ñóêíà[\LINK] è ñ èñïîëüçîâàíèåì [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Èíäèãî[\LINK].Èñïîëüçóéòå [LINK=UNIT_DYER]Îïûòíûõ êðàñèëüùèêîâ[\LINK] ÷òîáû ðåçêî óâåëè÷èòü âûïóñê ïðîäóêöèè, èëè áíîâèòå çäàíèå äî [LINK=BUILDING_LARGE_DYERY]Áîëüøîé êðàñèëüíè[\LINK].
TEXT.German: [TAB]Die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Färberei[COLOR_REVERT] ist das mittlere Level der Gebäudekette zur Herstellung von gefärbten Stoffen. Kolonisten mit dem Beruf Färber produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]gefärbte Stoffe[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stoffen[COLOR_REVERT] durch den Gebrauch von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Der Einsatz eines [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister-Färbers[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht die Produktion noch einmal drastisch.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dyery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for dyeing cloth. Colonists with profession Dyer produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] by using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dyery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for dyeing cloth. Colonists with profession Dyer produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] by using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Large Dyery[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings suitable for dying cloth. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_DYER]Dyer[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_COLOURED_CLOTH]Coloured Cloth[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_CLOTH]Cloth[\LINK] by using [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Indigo[\LINK]. In addition, the Large Dyery gives a 50% bonus to all Coloured Cloth production. Use [LINK=UNIT_DYER]Master Dyers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.French: [TAB][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Áîëüøàÿ êðàñèëüíÿ[COLOR_REVERT] - ìàêñèìàëüíûé óðîâåíü ñòðîåíèé, ïðèãîäíûõ äëÿ ïîêðàñêè òêàíåé.Êîëîíèñòû ñ ïðîôåññèåé [LINK=PROFESSION_DYER]Êðàñèëüùèêà[\LINK] ïðîèçâîäÿò [LINK=YIELD_COLOURED_CLOTH]Öâåòíóþ òêàíü[\LINK] èç [LINK=YIELD_CLOTH]Ñóêíà[\LINK] è ñ èñïîëüçîâàíèåì [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Èíäèãî[\LINK].Êðîìå òîãî Áîëüøàÿ êðàñèëüíÿ äàåò 50% áîíóñ äëÿ ïðîèçâîäñòâà.Èñïîëüçóéòå [LINK=UNIT_DYER]Îïûòíûõ êðàñèëüùèêîâ[\LINK] ÷òîáû ðåçêî óâåëè÷èòü âûïóñê ïðîäóêöèè.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]große Färberei[COLOR_REVERT] ist das höchste Level der Gebäudekette zur Herstellung von gefärbten Stoffen. Kolonisten mit dem Beruf Färber produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]gefärbte Stoffe[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stoffen[COLOR_REVERT] durch den Gebrauch von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT] Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Der Einsatz eines [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister-Färbers[COLOR_REVERT] erhöht die Produktion noch einmal drastisch.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Large Dyery[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for dying cloth. Colonists with profession Dyer produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] by using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Large Dyery[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for dying cloth. Colonists with profession Dyer produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] by using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dyers[COLOR_REVERT] dye [LINK=YIELD_CLOTH]Cloth[\LINK] with [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Indigo[\LINK] to make [LINK=YIELD_COLOURED_CLOTH]Coloured Cloth[\LINK] in the [LINK=BUILDING_DYERS_HOUSE]Dyer's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades. The master of this craft are [LINK=UNIT_DYER]Master Dyers[\LINK], who work twice as fast, as long as enough Indigo and Cloth are available.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Êðàñèëüùèêè[COLOR_REVERT] êðàñÿò [LINK=YIELD_CLOTH]Òêàíü[\LINK] èñïîëüçóÿ [LINK=YIELD_INDIGO]Èíäèãî[\LINK] ñîçäàâàÿ [LINK=YIELD_COLOURED_CLOTH]Öâåòíóþ òêàíü[\LINK] â [LINK=BUILDING_DYERS_HOUSE]Äîìå êðàñèëüùèêà[\LINK] èëè îäíîì èç åãî óëó÷øåíèé.Ìàñòåðà òîãî ðåìåñëà íàçûâàþòñÿ [LINK=UNIT_DYER]Îïûòíûìè êðàñèëüùèêàìè[\LINK], êîòîðûå ðàáîòàþò â äâà ðàçà áûñòðåå, ïîêà äîñòóïíû òêàíè è èíäèãî.
TEXT.German: Färber färben [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stoffe[COLOR_REVERT] mittels [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT], wodurch [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gefärbte Stoffe[COLOR_REVERT] entstehen. Dieser Prozess finden meist in Gebäuden der Stoffproduktion statt und ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Färber[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Dyers dye [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Dyers dye [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coloured Cloth[COLOR_REVERT] using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Indigo[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Goods[COLOR_REVERT] and other goods are sold to the colonists. The amount strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in gold. A Market is needed to enable the domestic market within a city.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ïðåäìåòû ðîñêîøè[COLOR_REVERT] è íåêîòîðûå äðóãèå òîâàðû ïîòðåáëÿþòñÿ êîëîíèñòàìè.Ñóììà ïðèáûëè ñèëüíî çàâèñèò îò êîëè÷åñòâà æèòåëåé ãîðîäà è èõ ñîöèàëüíîãî ñòàòóñà.Ïëàòÿò êîëîíèñòû íàïðÿìóþ è íàëè÷êîé.Äëÿ âíóòðåííåé òîðãîâëè íåîáõîäèìî ïîñòðîèòü ðûíîê.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxusgüter[COLOR_REVERT] aus Europa und andere Waren werden an die anderen Kolonisten verkauft. Die Verkaufsmenge hängt sehr stark von der Anzahl an reichen Bürgern der Stadt ab und wird direkt in Gold (Geld) bezahlt. Ein [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Markt[COLOR_REVERT] ist notwendig um den Handel innerhalb einer Kolonie zu ermöglichen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Goods[COLOR_REVERT] and other goods are sold to the colonists. The amount strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in gold. A Market is needed to enable the domestic market within a city.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Goods[COLOR_REVERT] and other goods are sold to the colonists. The amount strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in gold. A Market is needed to enable the domestic market within a city.

TEXT.English: [LINK=YIELD_LUXURY_GOODS]Luxury Goods[\LINK] and other goods can be sold to your colonists if a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Village Market[COLOR_REVERT] or one of its upgrades is present in a settlement. The amount that can be sold strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in money.The higher levels, [LINK=BUILDING_TOWN_MARKET]Town Market[\LINK] and [LINK=BUILDING_CENTRAL_CITY_MARKET]Regional Market[\LINK] increase the demand for goods in a city.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information, see [LINK=CONCEPT_DOMESTIC_MARKETS]Domestic Economy[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [LINK=YIELD_LUXURY_GOODS]Ïðåäìåòû ðîñêîøè[\LINK] è äðóãèå òîâàðû ìîãóò áûòü ïðîäàíû âàøèì êîëîíèñòàì åñëè [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Äåðåâåíñêèé ðûíîê[COLOR_REVERT] èëè îäíî èç åãî óëó÷øåíèé ïðèñóòñòâóþò â ïîñåëêå.Ïðèáûëü êîòîðàÿ ìîæåò áûòü ïîëó÷åíà, ñèëüíî çàâèñèò îò êîëè÷åñòâà æèòåëåé ãîðîäà è èõ ñîöèàëüíîãî ñòàòóñà. Îíè áóäóò íàïðÿìóþ ïëàòèòü íàëè÷êîé.Çäàíèÿ áîëåå âûñêîãî óðîâíÿ [LINK=BUILDING_TOWN_MARKET]Ãîðîäñêîé ðûíîê[\LINK] è [LINK=BUILDING_CENTRAL_CITY_MARKET]Ðåãèîíàëüíûé ðûíîê[\LINK] óâåëè÷èâàþò ñïðîñ íà òîâàðû â ãîðîäå.[PARAGRAPH:1]Çà ïîäðîáíîé èíôîðìàöèåé îáðàùàéòåñü ïî ññûëêå - [LINK=CONCEPT_DOMESTIC_MARKETS]Âíóòðåííÿ ýêîíîìèêà[\LINK].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxusgüter aus Europa[COLOR_REVERT] und andere Waren werden an die anderen Kolonisten verkauft. Die Verkaufsmenge hängt sehr stark von der Anzahl an reichen Bürgern der Stadt ab und wird direkt in Gold (Geld) bezahlt. Ein [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dorfmarkt[COLOR_REVERT] ist notwendig um den Handel innerhalb einer Kolonie zu ermöglichen. Die Ausbaustufen, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Städtischer Markt[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] Überregionaler Kolonialmarkt[COLOR_REVERT] erhöhen die Nachfrage.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Goods[COLOR_REVERT] and other goods are sold to the colonists. The amount strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in gold. A [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT] is needed to enable the domestic market within a city. The higher levels, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]City Market[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Central Regional Market[COLOR_REVERT] increase demand for goods in a city.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Goods[COLOR_REVERT] and other goods are sold to the colonists. The amount strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in gold. A [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT] is needed to enable the domestic market within a city. The higher levels, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]City Market[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Central Regional Market[COLOR_REVERT] increase demand for goods in a city.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] are necessary to build ships and artillery units. They can either be produced in your colonies with the according production buildings or bought in Europe.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ïóøêè[COLOR_REVERT] íåîáõîäèìû äëÿ ñòðîèòåëüñòâà êîðàáëåé è îñíàùåíèÿ àðòèëëåðèéñêèõ ïîäðàçäåëåíèé.Èõ ìîæíî ïðîèçâîäèòü â âàøèõ êîëîíèÿõ èëè êóïèòü â Åâðîïå.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kanonen[COLOR_REVERT] werden zum Bau von Schiffen oder Artillery an Land benötigt. Mit den entsprechenden Gebäuden können Kanonen selbst produziert oder auch in Europa gekauft werden.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] are necessary to build ships and artillery units. They can either be produced in your colonies with the according production buildings or bought in Europe.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] are necessary to build ships and artillery units. They can either be produced in your colonies with the according production buildings or bought in Europe.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannonsmiths[COLOR_REVERT] produce [LINK=YIELD_CANNONS]Cannons[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_TOOLS]Tools[\LINK] in the [LINK=BUILDING_ARMORY]Armory[\LINK] or one of its upgrades. Cannons are necessary to build ships and artillery units. The [LINK=UNIT_GUNSMITH]Master Gunsmith[\LINK] is the most effective unit when working as a Cannonsmith.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information, see [LINK=CONCEPT_GUNS]Guns, Cannons and Blades[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ïóøêîäåë[COLOR_REVERT] ïðîèçâîäèò [LINK=YIELD_CANNONS]Ïóøêè[\LINK] èç [LINK=YIELD_TOOLS]Èíñòðóìåíòîâ[\LINK] â [LINK=BUILDING_ARMORY]Àðñåíàëå[\LINK] èëè îäíîì èç åãî óëó÷øåíèé.Ïóøêè íåîáõîäèìû äëÿ ñòðîèòåëüñòâà êîðàáëåé è îñíàùåíèÿ àðòèëëåðèéñêèõ ïîäðàçäåëåíèé.[LINK=UNIT_GUNSMITH]Îïûòíûé îðóæåéíèê[\LINK] ýôôåêòèâíåé ïðî÷èõ ðàáîòàåò ïóøêîäåëîì.[PARAGRAPH:1]Çà ïîäðîáíîé èíôîðìàöèåé ïðîõîäèòå ïî ññûëêå [LINK=CONCEPT_GUNS]Ìóøêåòû,ïóøêè è êëèíêè[\LINK].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kanonenschmiede[COLOR_REVERT] stellen Kanonen her. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kanonen[COLOR_REVERT] werden zum Bau von Schiffen oder Artillery an Land benötigt.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannonsmiths[COLOR_REVERT] produce Cannons. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] are necessary to build ships and artillery units.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannonsmiths[COLOR_REVERT] produce Cannons. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] are necessary to build ships and artillery units.

TEXT.English: To make the most of a bountiful [LINK=YIELD_STONE]Stone[\LINK] [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_QUARRY]Quarry[\LINK], bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Stonecutter[COLOR_REVERT]. Expert Stonecutters are able to produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone[COLOR_REVERT] from a stone-producing tile.[PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Stonecutters can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_SCHOOLHOUSE]Schoolhouse[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: ×òîá ýôôåêòèâíî äîáûâàòü [LINK=YIELD_STONE]Êàìåíü[\LINK] èç [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_QUARRY]Êàðüåðà[\LINK], íàéìèòå [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Îïûòíîãî êàìíåòåñà[COLOR_REVERT].Îïûòíûé êàìíåòåñ ñïîñîáåí äîáûâàòü âäâîå áîëüøå [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Êàìíÿ[COLOR_REVERT] èç ñîîòâåòñòâóþùåãî ó÷àñòêà.[PARAGRAPH:1]Îïûòíîãî êàìíåòåñà ìîæíî íàíÿòü â [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Åâðîïå[\LINK], òàêæå åãî ìîæíî [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Îáó÷èòü[\LINK] â êîëîíèè ñ [LINK=BUILDING_SCHOOLHOUSE]Øêîëîé[\LINK] èëè îäíèì èç åå óëó÷øåíèé.
TEXT.German: Nutzen Sie wenn möglich [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Steinbergarbeiter[COLOR_REVERT], da diese die doppelte Menge [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stein[COLOR_REVERT] erzeugen.
TEXT.Italian: To make the most of a bountiful stone quarry, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Stonecutter[COLOR_REVERT]. Expert Stonecutter are able to produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone[COLOR_REVERT] from a stone-producing tile!
TEXT.Spanish: To make the most of a bountiful stone quarry, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Stonecutter[COLOR_REVERT]. Expert Stonecutter are able to produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone[COLOR_REVERT] from a stone-producing tile!

TEXT.English: When assigning a citizen to work a Peak tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stonecutter[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [LINK=YIELD_STONE]Stone[\LINK]. By assigning an [LINK=UNIT_STONECUTTER]Expert Stonecutter[\LINK] to this profession, your warehouse will brim over with stone!
TEXT.French: Ïðè íàçíà÷åíèè ãîðîæàíèíà íà ãîðíûå ðàáîòû, âû äàåòå åìó ïðîôåññèþ [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Êàìåíîòåñà[COLOR_REVERT], êîòîðàÿ îáåñïå÷èò âàøó êîëîíèþ [LINK=YIELD_STONE]Êàìíåì[\LINK] â èçáûòêå.Íàçíà÷èâ [LINK=UNIT_STONECUTTER]Îïûòíîãî êàìåíîòåñà[\LINK] íà ýòó ðàáîòó, ìåñòà ïîä êàìåíü íà ñêëàäå íå îñòàíåòñÿ!
TEXT.German: Beim Zuweisen eines Arbeiters zu einem Feld, welches Steinabbau erlaubt, kann dem Arbeiter der Beruf Steinbergarbeiter zugewiesen werden.
TEXT.Italian: When assigning a citizen to work a plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the Stonecutter profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Stonecutter[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your warehouse will brim over with stone!

By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Stonecutter[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your warehouse will brim over with stone!

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Wool[COLOR_REVERT] is produced when a Butcher is slaughtering [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT], to further process them to meat.

TEXT.English: When assigning a citizen to work a hills tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Shepherd[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [LINK=YIELD_SHEEP]Sheep[\LINK]. By assigning an [LINK=UNIT_RANCHER]Expert Rancher[\LINK] to this profession, your stables will teem with Sheep! Note, however, that you can only breed Sheep if some Sheep are already present in a colony.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about Livestock Breeding, see [LINK=CONCEPT_CATTLE_OR_SHEEP_BREEDING]Breeding Horses, Cattle or Sheep[\LINK]
TEXT.French: Ïðè íàçíà÷åíèè ãðàæäàíèíà íà ðàáîòó â õîëìèñòûå ó÷àñòêè,âû ìîæåòå äàòü åìó ïðîôåññèþ [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ïàñòóõà[COLOR_REVERT], ñ êîòîðîé îí îáåñïå÷èò âàøó êîëîíèþ [LINK=YIELD_SHEEP]Îâöàìè[\LINK]. Íàçíà÷èâ [LINK=UNIT_RANCHER]Îïûòíîãî ïàñòóõà[\LINK] íà ýòó ðàáîòó, âû çàïîëíèòå âàø ñêîòíûé äâîð îâöàìè! Çàìåòèì îäíàêî, ÷òî âû ìîæåòå ðàçâîäèòü îâåö òîëüêî åñëè îíè óæå ïðèñòóñòâóþò â êîëîíèè.[PARAGRAPH:1]Çà ïîäðîáíîé èíôîðìàöèåé î ðàçâåäåíèè ñêîòà îáðàùàéòåñü ïî ññûëêå - [LINK=CONCEPT_CATTLE_OR_SHEEP_BREEDING]Ðàçâåäåíèå ëîøàäåé,êðóïíîãî ðîãàòîãî ñêîòà è îâåö[\LINK]
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie einen Bürger anweisen, ein Hügel-Geländefeld zu bearbeiten, können Sie sich entscheiden, diesen Kolonisten den Beruf [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Schafhirte[COLOR_REVERT] zuzuweisen, wodurch Ihre Siedlung eine Menge [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Schafe[COLOR_REVERT] erhält. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Rancher[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, werden Ihre Lagerhäuser vor Schafen überquellen!

TEXT.German: Wenn Sie einen Bürger anweisen, ein Ebenen-Geländefeld zu bearbeiten, können Sie sich entscheiden, diesen Kolonisten den Beruf [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rinderhirte[COLOR_REVERT] zuzuweisen, wodurch Ihre Siedlung eine Menge [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rinder[COLOR_REVERT] erhält. TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] are very gifted on the areas of precision, patience and tolerance for awful smells that is required of anyone practicing the [LINK=PROFESSION_LEATHER_MAKER]Leather Maker[\LINK] profession. They are capable of producing double the amount of [LINK=YIELD_LEATHER]Leather[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_CATTLE_HIDES]Cowhides[\LINK] a regular colonist would create in the same period of time.[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Tanners can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Îïûòíûå êîæåâíèêè[COLOR_REVERT] âåñüìà ïðîôåññèîíàëüíû â îáëàñòè òî÷íîñòè, òåðïåíèÿ è òåðïèìîñòè ê óæàñíûì çàïàõàì,÷òî è òðåáóåòñÿ îò ëþáîãî [LINK=PROFESSION_LEATHER_MAKER]Êîæåâíèêà[\LINK]. Îíè ñïîñîáíû ïðîèçâîäèòü â äâà ðàçà áîëüøå [LINK=YIELD_LEATHER]Êîæè[\LINK] èç [LINK=YIELD_CATTLE_HIDES]Êîðîâüèõ øêóð[\LINK] ÷åì îáû÷íûé êîëîíèñò çà òî æå âðåìÿ.[PARAGRAPH:1]Îïûòíûå êîæåâíèêè ìîãóò áûòü íàíÿòû â [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Åâðîïå[\LINK], à òàêæå [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Îáó÷åíû[\LINK] â êîëîíèèè ñ [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]Êîëëåäæåì[\LINK] èëè îäíèì èç åãî óëó÷øåíèé .
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Ledergerber[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rinderhäute[COLOR_REVERT] in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lederwaren[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Goods[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Goods[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Ledermacher[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele Rinderhäute in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lederwaren[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Tanners[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tanners House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for tanning. Colonists with profession [LINK=PROFESSION_TANNER]Tanner[\LINK] produce [LINK=YIELD_LEATHER]Leather[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_HIDES]Cowhides[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_TANNER]Master Tanners[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade to a [LINK=BUILDING_TANNERY]Tannery[\LINK].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tanners House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for tanning. Colonists with profession [LINK=PROFESSION_TANNER]Tanner[\LINK] produce [LINK=YIELD_LEATHER]Leather[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_HIDES]Cowhides[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_TANNER]Master Tanners[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade to a [LINK=BUILDING_TANNERY]Tannery[\LINK].
TEXT.German: [TAB]Das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerberhaus[COLOR_REVERT] ist die niedrigste Ausbaustufe der Gebäudekette zum Gerben von Leder. Siedler im Beruf des Gerbers produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lederware[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rinderhäuten[COLOR_REVERT]. Durch [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gerber[COLOR_REVERT] wird die Produktion drastisch erhöht.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tanners House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for tanning. TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tannery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for tanning. Colonists with profession [LINK=PROFESSION_TANNER]Tanner[\LINK] produce [LINK=YIELD_LEATHER]Leather[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_HIDES]Cowhides[\LINK] in greater number than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_TANNERS_HOUSE]Tanner's House[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_TANNER]Master Tanners[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade to a [LINK=BUILDING_LEATHER_FACTORY]Leather Factory[\LINK].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tannery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for tanning. Colonists with profession [LINK=PROFESSION_TANNER]Tanner[\LINK] produce [LINK=YIELD_LEATHER]Leather[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_HIDES]Cowhides[\LINK] in greater number than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_TANNERS_HOUSE]Tanner's House[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_TANNER]Master Tanners[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade to a [LINK=BUILDING_LEATHER_FACTORY]Leather Factory[\LINK].
TEXT.German: [TAB]Die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerberei[COLOR_REVERT] ist die mittlere Ausbaustufe der Gebäudekette zum Gerben von Leder. Durch [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gerber[COLOR_REVERT] wird die Produktion drastisch erhöht.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tannery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for tanning. TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tannery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for tanning. TEXT.English: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Factory[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for tanning. Colonists with profession [LINK=PROFESSION_TANNER]Tanner[\LINK] produce [LINK=YIELD_LEATHER]Leather[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_HIDES]Cowhides[\LINK] in greater number than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_TANNERS_HOUSE]Tannery[\LINK], and the Leather factory provides a 50% production bonus of Leather on top of that. Use [LINK=UNIT_TANNER]Master Tanners[\LINK] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.French: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Factory[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for tanning. Use [LINK=UNIT_TANNER]Master Tanners[\LINK] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Weavers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool Cloth[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Îïûòíûå òêà÷è[COLOR_REVERT] ïðîèçâîäÿò â äâà ðàçà áîëüøå [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Øåðñòÿíîé îäåæäû[COLOR_REVERT].
