TEXT.English: By assigning a Colonist to work in a weaver's building, they can adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool Weaver[COLOR_REVERT] profession, turning any available [LINK=YIELD_WOOL]Wool[\LINK] into [LINK=YIELD_WOOL_CLOTH]Wool Cloth[\LINK]. Assigning a [LINK=UNIT_WEAVER]Master Weaver[\LINK] to the job with greatly increase the amount of Wool Cloth yielded. Just make sure you have the extra Wool for your weaver to use!
TEXT.French: Ïðè íàçíà÷åíèè êîëîíèñòà íà ðàáîòó â òêàöêèé äîì, åìó ìîæíî äàòü ïðîôåññèþ [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Òêà÷à(øåðñòü)[COLOR_REVERT] è ïðåîáðàçîâûâàòü ëþáóþ äîñòóïíóþ [LINK=YIELD_WOOL]Øåðñòü[\LINK] â [LINK=YIELD_WOOL_CLOTH]Øåðñòÿíóþ îäåæäó[\LINK]. Íàçíà÷åíèå [LINK=UNIT_WEAVER]Îïûòíîãî òêà÷à[\LINK] íà ýòó äîëæíîñòü çíà÷èòåëüíî óâåëè÷èò âûïóñê øåðñòÿíîé òêàíè.Ïðîñòî óáåäèòåñü ÷òî ó âàñ åñòü ëèøíÿÿ øåðñòü äëÿ âàøåãî òêà÷à!
TEXT.German: Weber scheidern [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wollkleidung[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wolle[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess finden in Gebäuden für Wollkleidungsproduktion statt und ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Weber[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Wool Weavers make [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Woolclothes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Wool Weavers make [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Woolclothes[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: To make the most of a bountiful salt deposit, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Saltminer[COLOR_REVERT] to work on it. Expert Saltminers can produce double the amout of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT] on a Salt deposit.
TEXT.French: ×òîáû ëó÷øå ðàçðàáàòûâàòü ìåñòîðîæäåíèå ñîëåé,íàçíà÷üòå [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Îïûòíîãî ñîëåêîïà[COLOR_REVERT] íà ýòó ðàáîòó.Îïûòíûå ñîëåêîïû ìîãóò äîáûâàòü â äâà ðàçà áîëüøå [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Êàìåííîé ñîëè[COLOR_REVERT] èç ñîëÿíûõ çàëåæåé.
TEXT.German: Um ein Salzvorkommen optimal zu nutzen, sollten Sie einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Salzminenarbeiter[COLOR_REVERT] darauf arbeiten lassen. Erfahrene Salzminenarbeiter können doppelt so viel [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Steinsalz[COLOR_REVERT] von einem Salzvorkommen fördern, wie andere Siedler!
TEXT.Italian: To make the most of a bountiful salt deposit, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Exp. Saltminer[COLOR_REVERT] to work on it. Exp. Saltminers can produce double the amout of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT] on a Salt deposit.
TEXT.Spanish: To make the most of a bountiful salt deposit, bring in an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Exp. Saltminer[COLOR_REVERT] to work on it. Exp. Saltminers can produce double the amout of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT] on a Salt deposit.

TEXT.English: By putting a colonist to work on a [LINK=TERRAIN_DESERT]Desert[\LINK] tile, you can assign him to the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt Miner[COLOR_REVERT] profession, to provide your settlement with a useful bounty of [LINK=YIELD_RAW_SALT]Rock Salt[\LINK]. Assigning an [LINK=UNIT_MINER]Expert Miner[\LINK] to this job will yield an increased amount of Rock Salt.
TEXT.French: Îòïðàâèâ êîëîíèñòà ðàáîòàòü â [LINK=TERRAIN_DESERT]Ïóñòûíþ[\LINK], âû ìîæåòå íàçíà÷èòü åãî [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ñîëåêîïîì[COLOR_REVERT], ÷òîáû îáåñïå÷èòü âàøèõ ãðàæäàí äîñòàòî÷íûì êîëè÷åñòâîì [LINK=YIELD_RAW_SALT]Êàìåííîé ñîëè[\LINK].Íàçíà÷èâ [LINK=UNIT_MINER]Îïûòíîãî øàõòåðà[\LINK] íà ýòó ðàáîòó,âû óâåëè÷èòå äîáû÷ó.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Steinsalz[COLOR_REVERT] kann zu [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salz[COLOR_REVERT] weiterverarbeitet werden. Dieses erzielt beim Verkauf einen hohen Preis, sowohl in Europa, wie auch auf dem Binnenmarkt der Kolonien. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Minenarbeiter[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, erhalten Sie sogar noch mehr von diesem durchaus lohnenden Gut!
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT] can be processed into [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Miner[COLOR_REVERT] to this job will yield an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT] can be processed into [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Miner[COLOR_REVERT] to this job will yield an increased amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Hills on [LINK=TERRAIN_PLAINS]Prairie[\LINK] tiles can produce [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] if a Colonist is working as [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper Planter[COLOR_REVERT] on that tile. You can double the output if that colonist is an [LINK=UNIT_RED_PEPPER_PLANTER]Expert Red Pepper Planter[\LINK].
TEXT.French: Hills on [LINK=TERRAIN_PLAINS]Prairie[\LINK] tiles can produce [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] if a Colonist is working as [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper Planter[COLOR_REVERT] on that tile. You can double the output if that colonist is an [LINK=UNIT_RED_PEPPER_PLANTER]Expert Red Pepper Planter[\LINK].
TEXT.German: Hügelfelder in der Prairie können [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Roten Pfeffer[COLOR_REVERT] hervorbringen, wenn dem dort arbeitenden Kolonisten der Pfefferpflanzerberuf zugewiesen wurde. Ihre Pfefferernte kann erheblich gesteigert werden, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Pfefferpflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Hills on Prairie-Tiles can produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] if a Colonist is working as Pepperplanter on that tile. You can double the output if that colonist is a specialist.
TEXT.Spanish: Hills on Prairie-Tiles can produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] if a Colonist is working as Pepperplanter on that tile. You can double the output if that colonist is a specialist.

TEXT.English: If you want to get your [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Spice Trade[\LINK] booming, hire an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Red Pepper Planter[COLOR_REVERT] first. Expert Red Pepper Planters gather twice as much [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] from the plot on which they work when assigned to the [LINK=PROFESSION_RED_PEPPER_PLANTER]Red Pepper Planter[\LINK] profession as a normal colonist would.[PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Red Pepper Planters can be trained by [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Natives[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: If you want to get your [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Spice Trade[\LINK] booming, hire an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Red Pepper Planter[COLOR_REVERT] first. Expert Red Pepper Planters gather twice as much [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] from the plot on which they work when assigned to the [LINK=PROFESSION_RED_PEPPER_PLANTER]Red Pepper Planter[\LINK] profession as a normal colonist would.[PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Red Pepper Planters can be trained by [LINK=CONCEPT_NATIVES]Natives[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Pfefferpflanzer[COLOR_REVERT] verdoppeln den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pfeffer[COLOR_REVERT]ertrag jedes Geländefelds, auf dem sie arbeiten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Redpepper Planters[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Redpepper[COLOR_REVERT] from any tile they work.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Redpepper Planters[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Redpepper[COLOR_REVERT] from any tile they work.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] delicately sort out the [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_RAW_SALT]Rock Salt[\LINK] that is brought into your colony's stores to make valuable [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Spices[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_SALT]Salt[\LINK] out of it. When assigned to the [LINK=PROFESSION_SPICE_TRADER]Spice Trader[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_SALT_TRADER]Salt Trader[\LINK] profession, they are capable of turning out double the amount of both resources in the same amount of time it would take a regular colonist to create it.[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Spice Traders can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] delicately sort out the [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_RAW_SALT]Rock Salt[\LINK] that is brought into your colony's stores to make valuable [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Spices[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_SALT]Salt[\LINK] out of it. When assigned to the [LINK=PROFESSION_SPICE_TRADER]Spice Trader[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_SALT_TRADER]Salt Trader[\LINK] profession, they are capable of turning out double the amount of both resources in the same amount of time it would take a regular colonist to create it.[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Spice Traders can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gewürzhändler[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviel Roten Pfeffer in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürze[COLOR_REVERT] bzw. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rohsalz[COLOR_REVERT] in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salz[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Colonists working in the [LINK=BUILDING_SPICE_TRADER_HOUSE]Spice Trader's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades can work as [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT], and dry [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] to make [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Spices[\LINK]. Assigning a [LINK=UNIT_SPICE_TRADER]Master Spice Trader[\LINK] to this profession even doubles the output of Spices, as long as enough Red Pepper is available.
TEXT.French: Colonists working in the [LINK=BUILDING_SPICE_TRADER_HOUSE]Spice Trader's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades can work as [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT], and dry [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] to make [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Spices[\LINK]. Assigning a [LINK=UNIT_SPICE_TRADER]Master Spice Trader[\LINK] to this profession even doubles the output of Spices, as long as enough Red Pepper is available.
TEXT.German: Gewürzhändler trocknen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Roten Pfeffer[COLOR_REVERT] zu [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürzen[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gewürzhändler[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Spice Traders dry [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: Spice Traders dry [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_SPICE_TRADER]Spice Trader[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_SALT_TRADER]Salt Trader[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Spices[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] or [LINK=YIELD_SALT]Salt[\LINK] from [LINK=RAW_SALT]Rock Salt[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_SPICE_TRADER]Master Spice Traders[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_SPICE_TRADERS_POST]Spice Trading Post[\LINK].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_SPICE_TRADER]Spice Trader[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_SALT_TRADER]Salt Trader[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Spices[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] or [LINK=YIELD_SALT]Salt[\LINK] from [LINK=RAW_SALT]Rock Salt[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_SPICE_TRADER]Master Spice Traders[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_SPICE_TRADERS_POST]Spice Trading Post[\LINK].
TEXT.German: [TAB]Das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürzhändlerhaus[COLOR_REVERT] ist die niedrigste Ausbaustufe des Gebäudes für den Handel mit Gewürzen und Salz. Siedler in den Berufen Gewürzhändler oder Salzhändler produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürze[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rotem Pfeffer[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salz[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rohsalz[COLOR_REVERT]. Durch [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gewürzhändler[COLOR_REVERT] wird die Produktion stark erhöht.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with professions Spice Trader or Salt Trader produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with professions Spice Trader or Salt Trader produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Trading Post[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_SPICE_TRADER]Spice Trader[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_SALT_TRADER]Salt Trader[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Spices[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] or [LINK=YIELD_SALT]Salt[\LINK] from [LINK=RAW_SALT]Rock Salt[\LINK] in much greater number than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_SPICE_TRADERS_HOUSE]Spice Trader's House[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_SPICE_TRADER]Master Spice Traders[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_SPICE_TRADERS_HALL]Spice Trader's Hall[\LINK].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Trading Post[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_SPICE_TRADER]Spice Trader[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_SALT_TRADER]Salt Trader[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Spices[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] or [LINK=YIELD_SALT]Salt[\LINK] from [LINK=RAW_SALT]Rock Salt[\LINK] in much greater number than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_SPICE_TRADERS_HOUSE]Spice Trader's House[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_SPICE_TRADER]Master Spice Traders[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_SPICE_TRADERS_HALL]Spice Trader's Hall[\LINK].
TEXT.German: [TAB]Der [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürzhandelsposten[COLOR_REVERT] ist die mittlere Ausbaustufe des Gebäudes für den Handel mit Gewürzen und Salz. Siedler in den Berufen Gewürzhändler oder Salzhändler produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürze[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rotem Pfeffer[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salz[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rohsalz[COLOR_REVERT]. Durch [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gewürzhändler[COLOR_REVERT] wird die Produktion stark erhöht.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders Post[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with professions Spice Trader or Salt Trader produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders Post[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with professions Spice Trader or Salt Trader produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders Hall[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_SPICE_TRADER]Spice Trader[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_SALT_TRADER]Salt Trader[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Spices[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] or [LINK=YIELD_SALT]Salt[\LINK] from [LINK=RAW_SALT]Rock Salt[\LINK] in much greater number than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_SPICE_TRADERS_POST]Spice Trading Post[\LINK], and the Spice Trader's Hall grants a 50% production bonus of both Spices and Salt on top of that. Use [LINK=UNIT_SPICE_TRADER]Master Spice Traders[\LINK] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.French: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders Hall[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_SPICE_TRADER]Spice Trader[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_SALT_TRADER]Salt Trader[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_SPICES]Spices[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_RED_PEPPER]Red Pepper[\LINK] or [LINK=YIELD_SALT]Salt[\LINK] from [LINK=RAW_SALT]Rock Salt[\LINK] in much greater number than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_SPICE_TRADERS_POST]Spice Trading Post[\LINK], and the Spice Trader's Hall grants a 50% production bonus of both Spices and Salt on top of that. Use [LINK=UNIT_SPICE_TRADER]Master Spice Traders[\LINK] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürzhandelshalle[COLOR_REVERT] ist die höchste Ausbaustufe des Gebäudes für den Handel mit Gewürzen und Salz. Siedler in den Berufen Gewürzhändler oder Salzhändler produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gewürze[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rotem Pfeffer[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salz[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rohsalz[COLOR_REVERT]. Durch [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gewürzhändler[COLOR_REVERT] wird die Produktion stark erhöht.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders Hall[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with professions Spice Trader or Salt Trader produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spice Traders Hall[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for trading with spices and salt. Colonists with professions Spice Trader or Salt Trader produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Red Pepper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Spice Traders[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: No [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_VINEYARD]Vineyard[\LINK] is truly complete without an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Grape Picker[COLOR_REVERT] inside to pick the best [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK] available. If he is assigned to the [LINK=PROFESSION_GRAPES_PICKER]Grape Picker[\LINK] profession, any Grapes-producing tile worked by him will yield an increased amount of [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Grape Pickers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_SCHOOLHOUSE]Schoolhouse[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: No [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_VINEYARD]Vineyard[\LINK] is truly complete without an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Grape Picker[COLOR_REVERT] inside to pick the best [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK] available. If he is assigned to the [LINK=PROFESSION_GRAPES_PICKER]Grape Picker[\LINK] profession, any Grapes-producing tile worked by him will yield an increased amount of [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]Expert Grape Pickers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_SCHOOLHOUSE]Schoolhouse[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrene Weintraubensammler[COLOR_REVERT] verdoppeln den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Weintrauben[COLOR_REVERT]ertrag jedes Geländefelds, auf dem sie arbeiten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Grapes Planters[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT] from any tile they work.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Grapes Planters[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT] from any tile they work.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Vintagers[COLOR_REVERT] are creators of the finest wines the New World can offer. They produce twice as much [LINK=YIELD_WINE]Wine[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK] as a regular colonist when assigned to the [LINK=PROFESSION_WINE_MAKER]Wine Maker[\LINK] profession.[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Vintagers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Vintagers[COLOR_REVERT] are creators of the finest wines the New World can offer. They produce twice as much [LINK=YIELD_WINE]Wine[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK] as a regular colonist when assigned to the [LINK=PROFESSION_WINE_MAKER]Wine Maker[\LINK] profession.[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Vintagers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Winzer[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeiten doppelt soviele [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Weintrauben[COLOR_REVERT] in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wein[COLOR_REVERT], wie andere Kolonisten.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Winemakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Winemakers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Hills on [LINK=TERRAIN_GRASS]Grassland[\LINK] tiles can produce [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK] if a colonist in the profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grape Picker[COLOR_REVERT] is working on it. This output will be greatly increased if an [LINK=UNIT_GRAPES_PICKER]Expert Grape Picker[\LINK] is employed for this job.
TEXT.French: Hills on [LINK=TERRAIN_GRASS]Grassland[\LINK] tiles can produce [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK] if a colonist in the profession [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grape Picker[COLOR_REVERT] is working on it. This output will be greatly increased if an [LINK=UNIT_GRAPES_PICKER]Expert Grape Picker[\LINK] is employed for this job.
TEXT.German: Hügelfelder auf Grasland können [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Weintrauben[COLOR_REVERT] hervorbringen, wenn dem dort arbeitenden Kolonisten der Weintraubensammler zugewiesen wurde. Ihre Weintraubenernte kann erheblich gesteigert werden, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Weintraubensammler[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Hills on Grasland can produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT] if a cololnist in the profession Grapescollector is working on it.
TEXT.Spanish: Hills on Grasland can produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT] if a cololnist in the profession Grapescollector is working on it.

TEXT.English: Colonists working in the [LINK=BUILDING_WINE_MAKERS_HOUSE]Vintager's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades become [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vintagers[COLOR_REVERT], who press [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK] to Juice, which then is fermented and turned into [LINK=YIELD_WINE]Wine[\LINK]. The colonists who excel at this craft are [LINK=UNIT_WINE_MAKER]Master Vintagers[\LINK].
TEXT.French: Colonists working in the [LINK=BUILDING_WINE_MAKERS_HOUSE]Vintager's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades become [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vintagers[COLOR_REVERT], who press [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK] to Juice, which then is fermented and turned into [LINK=YIELD_WINE]Wine[\LINK]. The colonists who excel at this craft are [LINK=UNIT_WINE_MAKER]Master Vintagers[\LINK].
TEXT.German: Winzer pressen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Weintrauben[COLOR_REVERT] zu Traubensaft, aus dem dann [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wein[COLOR_REVERT] entsteht. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Winzer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Winemakers press [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT] to Juice, which then is made to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Winemakers press [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winegrapes[COLOR_REVERT] to Juice, which then is made to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vintager's House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level building that is available for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_WINE_MAKER]Wine Maker[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_WINE]Wine[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_WINE_MAKER]Master Vintagers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_WINERY]Winery[\LINK].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vintager's House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level building that is available for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_WINE_MAKER]Wine Maker[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_WINE]Wine[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_WINE_MAKER]Master Vintagers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_WINERY]Winery[\LINK].
TEXT.German: [TAB]Das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winzerhaus[COLOR_REVERT] ist die niedrigest Stufe der Gebäude für die Herstellung von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wein[COLOR_REVERT]. In einem Winzerhaus wird Wein aus Weintrauben hergestellt, indem man einem Kolonisten den Beruf Winzer zuweist. [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Winzer[COLOR_REVERT] sind hierin noch effektiver.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vintager's House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with profession Vintager produce Wine from Winegrapes. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Vintagers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Vintager's House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with profession Vintager produce Wine from Winegrapes. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Vintagers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_WINE_MAKER]Wine Maker[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_WINE]Wine[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK] in much greater quantities than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_VINTAGERS_HOUSE]Vintager's House[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_WINE_MAKER]Master Vintagers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_WINE_FACTORY]Wine Factory[\LINK].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_WINE_MAKER]Wine Maker[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_WINE]Wine[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK] in much greater quantities than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_VINTAGERS_HOUSE]Vintager's House[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_WINE_MAKER]Master Vintagers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_WINE_FACTORY]Wine Factory[\LINK].
TEXT.German: [TAB]Die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winzerei[COLOR_REVERT] ist die mittlere Stufe der Gebäude für die Herstellung von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wein[COLOR_REVERT]. In einer Winzerei wird Wein aus Weintrauben hergestellt, indem man einem Kolonisten den Beruf Winzer zuweist. [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Winzer[COLOR_REVERT] sind hierin noch effektiver.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with profession Vintager produce Wine from Winegrapes. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Vintagers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Winery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with profession Vintager produce Wine from Winegrapes. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Vintagers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine Factory[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_WINE_MAKER]Wine Maker[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_WINE]Wine[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK] in much greater quantities than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_WINERY]Winery[\LINK]. Additionally, your settlement gets a 50% production bonus for Wine. Use [LINK=UNIT_WINE_MAKER]Master Vintagers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine Factory[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with the [LINK=PROFESSION_WINE_MAKER]Wine Maker[\LINK] profession produce [LINK=YIELD_WINE]Wine[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_GRAPES]Grapes[\LINK] in much greater quantities than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_WINERY]Winery[\LINK]. Additionally, your settlement gets a 50% production bonus for Wine. Use [LINK=UNIT_WINE_MAKER]Master Vintagers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Weinfabrik[COLOR_REVERT] ist die höchste Stufe der Gebäude für die Herstellung von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wein[COLOR_REVERT]. In einer Weinfabrik wird Wein aus Weintrauben hergestellt, indem man einem Kolonisten den Beruf Winzer zuweist. [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Winzer[COLOR_REVERT] sind hierin noch effektiver.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine Factory[COLOR_REVERT] is theh ighest level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with profession Vintager produce Wine from Winegrapes. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Vintagers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine Factory[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for production of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT]. Colonists with profession Vintager produce Wine from Winegrapes. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Vintagers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Cabinetmakers[COLOR_REVERT] are the ultimate artisans when it comes to designing Furniture, Cabinets and ornate Coffee Grinders. Assigning them to the [LINK=PROFESSION_FURNITURE_MAKER]Furniture Maker[\LINK] profession in your settlement will cause them to churn out [LINK=YIELD_FURNITURE]Furniture[\LINK] twice as fast as other colonists, as long as enough [LINK=YIELD_VALUABLE_WOOD]Valuable Wood[\LINK] is available.[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Cabinetmakers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Cabinetmakers[COLOR_REVERT] are the ultimate artisans when it comes to designing Furniture, Cabinets and ornate Coffee Grinders. Assigning them to the [LINK=PROFESSION_FURNITURE_MAKER]Furniture Maker[\LINK] profession in your settlement will cause them to churn out [LINK=YIELD_FURNITURE]Furniture[\LINK] twice as fast as other colonists, as long as enough [LINK=YIELD_VALUABLE_WOOD]Valuable Wood[\LINK] is available.[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Cabinetmakers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Möbelschreiner[COLOR_REVERT]erzeugen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Möbel[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Edelholz[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Möbelschreiner[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Master Furniture Makers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Furniture[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Valuable Wood[COLOR_REVERT] than other colonists.
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Master Furniture Makers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Furniture[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Valuable Wood[COLOR_REVERT] than other colonists.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cabinetmaker's House[COLOR_REVERT] is the most basic building available for the production of [LINK=YIELD_FURNITURE]Furniture[\LINK]. Colonists with the profession [LINK=PROFESSION_FURNITURE_MAKER]Furniture Maker[\LINK] produce [LINK=YIELD_FURNITURE]Furniture[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_VALUABLE_WOOD]Valuable Wood[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_FURNITURE_MAKER]Master Cabinetmakers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_FURNITURY]Cabinetmaker's Shop[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cabinetmaker's House[COLOR_REVERT] is the most basic building available for the production of [LINK=YIELD_FURNITURE]Furniture[\LINK]. Colonists with the profession [LINK=PROFESSION_FURNITURE_MAKER]Furniture Maker[\LINK] produce [LINK=YIELD_FURNITURE]Furniture[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_VALUABLE_WOOD]Valuable Wood[\LINK]. TEXT.German: [TAB]Das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Möbelmacherhaus[COLOR_REVERT] ist die niedrigest Stufe der Gebäude für die Herstellung von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Möbeln[COLOR_REVERT]. In einem Möbemacherhaus werden aus Edelholz teure Möbel hergestellt, indem man einem Kolonisten den Beruf Möbelschreiner zuweist. Meister [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Möbelschreiner[COLOR_REVERT] sind hierin noch effektiver.

Colonists with profession Furniture Maker produce Furniture from Valuable Wood. Use Master [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Furniture Makers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cabinetmaker's Shop[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for production of [LINK=YIELD_FURNITURE]Furniture[\LINK]. Colonists with the profession [LINK=PROFESSION_FURNITURE_MAKER]Furniture Maker[\LINK] produce [LINK=YIELD_FURNITURE]Furniture[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_VALUABLE_WOOD]Valuable Wood[\LINK] faster than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_FURNITURE_MAKERS_HOUSE]Furniture Maker's House[\LINK]. TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taverns[COLOR_REVERT] bring profits by selling alcohol and entertainment to your colonists by turning Culture into money. The higher the [LINK=YIELD_CULTURE]Culture[\LINK] rate, the more effective they are. The higher levels of the building, the [LINK=BUILDING_SALOON]Saloon[\LINK], the [LINK=BUILDING_THEATRE]Theatre[\LINK] and the National Wonder of the [LINK=BUILDING_OPERA]Grand Opera[\LINK] further increase that effect.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about the colonial economy, see [LINK=CONCEPT_DOMESTIC_MARKETS]Domestic Economy[\LINK]. For more information about Culture, see [LINK=CONCEPT_BORDERS]Borders and Culture[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taverns[COLOR_REVERT] bring profits by selling alcohol and entertainment to your colonists by turning Culture into money. The higher the [LINK=YIELD_CULTURE]Culture[\LINK] rate, the more effective they are. The higher levels of the building, the [LINK=BUILDING_SALOON]Saloon[\LINK], the [LINK=BUILDING_THEATRE]Theatre[\LINK] and the National Wonder of the [LINK=BUILDING_OPERA]Grand Opera[\LINK] further increase that effect.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about the colonial economy, see [LINK=CONCEPT_DOMESTIC_MARKETS]Domestic Economy[\LINK]. For more information about Culture, see [LINK=CONCEPT_BORDERS]Borders and Culture[\LINK].
TEXT.German: [TAB][COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tavernen[COLOR_REVERT] erwirtschaften einen Profit durch den Verkauf von Alkohol. Je höher die Kulturrate der Stadt, desto effektiver sind sie. Die Ausbaustufen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Saloon[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Theater[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Koloniales Opernhaus[COLOR_REVERT] erhöhen den Gewinn durch Kultur.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB][COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taverns[COLOR_REVERT] bring profits by selling alcohol and entertainment to your colonists. The higher the culture rate, the more effective they are. The higher levels of the building, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Saloon[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Theater[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grand Opera[COLOR_REVERT] increase that effect.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB][COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taverns[COLOR_REVERT] bring profits by selling alcohol and entertainment to your colonists. The higher the culture rate, the more effective they are. The higher levels of the building, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Saloon[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Theater[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grand Opera[COLOR_REVERT] increase that effect.

TEXT.English: When assigning a citizen to work a grasland or plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with barley!
TEXT.French: When assigning a citizen to work a grasland or plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with barley!
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie einen Bürger anweisen, ein Ebenen- oder Grasland-Geländefeld zu bearbeiten, können Sie sich entscheiden, diesen Kolonisten den Beruf [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerstebauer[COLOR_REVERT] zuzuweisen, wodurch Ihre Siedlung eine Menge [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerste[COLOR_REVERT] erhält. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Bauern[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, werden Ihre Lagerhäuser vor [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gerste[COLOR_REVERT] überquellen!
TEXT.Italian: When assigning a citizen to work a grasland or plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with barley!
TEXT.Spanish: When assigning a citizen to work a grasland or plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with barley!

TEXT.English: When assigning a citizen to work a [LINK=TERRAIN_GRASS]Grassland[\LINK] or [LINK=TERRAIN_PLAINS]Prairie[\LINK] tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [LINK=YIELD_BARLEY]Barley[\LINK]. By assigning an [LINK=UNIT_FARMER]Expert Farmer[\LINK] to this profession, your stores will brim over with Barley!
TEXT.French: When assigning a citizen to work a [LINK=TERRAIN_GRASS]Grassland[\LINK] or [LINK=TERRAIN_PLAINS]Prairie[\LINK] tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [LINK=YIELD_BARLEY]Barley[\LINK]. By assigning an [LINK=UNIT_FARMER]Expert Farmer[\LINK] to this profession, your stores will brim over with Barley!
TEXT.German: Wenn Sie einen Bürger anweisen, ein Ebenen- oder Grasland-Geländefeld zu bearbeiten, können Sie sich entscheiden, diesen Kolonisten den Beruf [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerstebauer[COLOR_REVERT] zuzuweisen, wodurch Ihre Siedlung eine Menge [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerste[COLOR_REVERT] erhält. Wenn Sie diesem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Erfahrenen Bauern[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen, werden Ihre Lagerhäuser vor [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gerste[COLOR_REVERT] überquellen!
TEXT.Italian: When assigning a citizen to work a grasland or plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with barley!
TEXT.Spanish: When assigning a citizen to work a grasland or plains tile, you may opt for your colonist to adopt the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] profession, which will provide your colony with a bounty of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT]. By assigning an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Farmer[COLOR_REVERT] to this profession, your stores will brim over with barley!

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Brewers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Beer[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Brewers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Beer[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: If you suddenly find yourself in need of large quantities of [LINK=YIELD_BEER]Beer[\LINK], as can happen sometimes, then the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Brewer[COLOR_REVERT] can help you out. In the [LINK=PROFESSION_BREWER]Brewer[\LINK] profession, he is capable of creating double the normal amount of Beer as regular colonists would from [LINK=YIELD_BARLEY]Barley[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Brewers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: If you suddenly find yourself in need of large quantities of [LINK=YIELD_BEER]Beer[\LINK], as can happen sometimes, then the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Brewer[COLOR_REVERT] can help you out. In the [LINK=PROFESSION_BREWER]Brewer[\LINK] profession, he is capable of creating double the normal amount of Beer as regular colonists would from [LINK=YIELD_BARLEY]Barley[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]Master Brewers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Brewer's House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of brewery buildings. Colonists assigned to the profession of [LINK=PROFESSION_BREWER]Brewer[\LINK] brew [LINK=YIELD_BEER]Beer[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_BARLEY]Barley[\LINK] in this building. Use [LINK=UNIT_BREWER]Master Brewers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_BREWERY]Brewery[\LINK].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Brewer's House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of brewery buildings. Colonists assigned to the profession of [LINK=PROFESSION_BREWER]Brewer[\LINK] brew [LINK=YIELD_BEER]Beer[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_BARLEY]Barley[\LINK] in this building. TEXT.German: Das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Brauhaus[COLOR_REVERT] ist die kleinste Stufe einer Braugebäudes. Bierbrauer produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bier[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerste[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Bierbrauer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Brewers House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of brewery buildings. Brewers brew [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Beer[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Brewers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

Use [LINK=UNIT_BREWER]Master Brewers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_BEER_FACTORY]Beer Factory[\LINK].

TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bierfabrik[COLOR_REVERT] ist die höchste Stufe einer Braugebäudes. Bierbrauer produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bier[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerste[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Bierbrauer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Beer Factory[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of brewery buildings. Brewers brew [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Beer[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Brewers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Butchers[COLOR_REVERT] are valuable cogs in your Food-production machinery. These specialists are capable of slaughtering double the number of [LINK=YIELD_SHEEP]Sheep[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_CATTLE]Cattle[\LINK] in the same amount of time as a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Free Colonist[COLOR_REVERT] would, when assigned to either the [LINK=PROFESSION_BUTCHER_SHEEP]Butcher (Sheep)[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_BUTCHER_CATTLE]Butcher (Cattle)[\LINK] profession. So they produce twice as much [LINK=YIELD_WOOL]Wool[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_HIDES]Cowhides[\LINK] and in addition to this, Master Butchers produce an equal amount of [LINK=YIELD_FOOD] as well![PARAGRAPH:1]Master Butchers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Butchers[COLOR_REVERT] are valuable cogs in your Food-production machinery. These specialists are capable of slaughtering double the number of [LINK=YIELD_SHEEP]Sheep[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_CATTLE]Cattle[\LINK] in the same amount of time as a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Free Colonist[COLOR_REVERT] would, when assigned to either the [LINK=PROFESSION_BUTCHER_SHEEP]Butcher (Sheep)[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_BUTCHER_CATTLE]Butcher (Cattle)[\LINK] profession. So they produce twice as much [LINK=YIELD_WOOL]Wool[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_HIDES]Cowhides[\LINK] and in addition to this, Master Butchers produce an equal amount of [LINK=YIELD_FOOD] as well![PARAGRAPH:1]Master Butchers can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_COLLEGE]College[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Schlachtermeister[COLOR_REVERT] produzieren doppelt so viel [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nahrung[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wolle[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tierhäute[COLOR_REVERT] von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Schafen[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rindern[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Butchers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Food[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cattle[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Butchers[COLOR_REVERT] produce double the amount of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Food[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cattle[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Butcher's House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for butchers. Colonists with profession [LINK=PROFESSION_BUTCHER_SHEEP]Butcher (Sheep)[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_BUTCHER_CATTLE]Butcher (Cattle)[\LINK] produce [LINK=YIELD_FOOD]Food[\LINK], and [LINK=YIELD_WOOL]Wool[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_HIDES]Cowhides[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_SHEEP]Sheep[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_CATTLE]Cattle[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_BUTCHER]Master Butchers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_BUTCHERY]Butchery[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about obtaining Food, see [LINK=CONCEPT_FOOD]Food[\LINK].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Butcher's House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for butchers. Colonists with profession [LINK=PROFESSION_BUTCHER_SHEEP]Butcher (Sheep)[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_BUTCHER_CATTLE]Butcher (Cattle)[\LINK] produce [LINK=YIELD_FOOD]Food[\LINK], and [LINK=YIELD_WOOL]Wool[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_HIDES]Cowhides[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_SHEEP]Sheep[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_CATTLE]Cattle[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_BUTCHER]Master Butchers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_BUTCHERY]Butchery[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about obtaining Food, see [LINK=CONCEPT_FOOD]Food[\LINK].
TEXT.German: [TAB]Das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Metzgerhaus[COLOR_REVERT] ist die niedrigste Ausbaustufe des Gebäudes zum Schlachten von Vieh. Siedler im Beruf des Metzgers produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nahrung[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wolle[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rinderhäute[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Schafen[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rindern[COLOR_REVERT]. Durch [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Metzger[COLOR_REVERT] wird die Produktion drastisch erhöht.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Butchers House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for butchers. Colonists with profession Butcher produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Food[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cattle[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Butchers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.
TEXT.Spanish: [TAB]The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Butchers House[COLOR_REVERT] is the lowest level of buildings for butchers. Colonists with profession Butcher produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Food[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cattle[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Butchers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Butchery[COLOR_REVERT] is the intermediate level of buildings for butchers. Colonists with profession [LINK=PROFESSION_BUTCHER_SHEEP]Butcher (Sheep)[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_BUTCHER_CATTLE]Butcher (Cattle)[\LINK] produce [LINK=YIELD_FOOD]Food[\LINK], and [LINK=YIELD_WOOL]Wool[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_HIDES]Cowhides[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_SHEEP]Sheep[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_CATTLE]Cattle[\LINK]. They do this twice as fast as they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_BUTCHERS_HOUSE]Butcher's House[\LINK]. Use [LINK=UNIT_BUTCHER]Master Butchers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output, or upgrade this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_SLAUGHTERHOUSE]Slaughterhouse[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about obtaining Food, see [LINK=CONCEPT_FOOD]Food[\LINK].

Durch [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Metzger[COLOR_REVERT] wird die Produktion drastisch erhöht.

Colonists with profession Butcher produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Food[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wool[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cattle[COLOR_REVERT]. Use [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Butchers[COLOR_REVERT] to drastically increase the output.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Slaughterhouse[COLOR_REVERT] is the highest level of buildings for butchers. Colonists with profession [LINK=PROFESSION_BUTCHER_SHEEP]Butcher (Sheep)[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_BUTCHER_CATTLE]Butcher (Cattle)[\LINK] produce [LINK=YIELD_FOOD]Food[\LINK], and [LINK=YIELD_WOOL]Wool[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_HIDES]Cowhides[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_SHEEP]Sheep[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_CATTLE]Cattle[\LINK]. They do this just as fast as they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_BUTCHERY]Butchery[\LINK], but they receive a 50% bonus for the production of Wool and Cowhides as well. Use [LINK=UNIT_BUTCHER]Master Butchers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about obtaining Food, see [LINK=CONCEPT_FOOD]Food[\LINK].

They do this just as fast as they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_BUTCHERY]Butchery[\LINK], but they receive a 50% bonus for the production of Wool and Cowhides as well. Use [LINK=UNIT_BUTCHER]Master Butchers[\LINK] to drastically increase the output.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about obtaining Food, see [LINK=CONCEPT_FOOD]Food[\LINK].

TEXT.English: You can assign colonists to the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lumberjack (Valuable Wood)[COLOR_REVERT] profession, and have them harvest [LINK=YIELD_VALUABLE_WOOD]Valuable Wood[\LINK] from [LINK=FEATURE_FOREST_TUNDRA]Taiga[\LINK] or [LINK=FEAUTRE_JUNGLE]Jungles[\LINK]. If an [LINK=UNIT_LUMBERJACK]Expert Lumberjack[\LINK] is assigned to this profession, you will receive additional Valuable Wood at no extra cost.
TEXT.French: You can assign colonists to the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lumberjack (Valuable Wood)[COLOR_REVERT] profession, and have them harvest [LINK=YIELD_VALUABLE_WOOD]Valuable Wood[\LINK] from [LINK=FEATURE_FOREST_TUNDRA]Taiga[\LINK] or [LINK=FEAUTRE_JUNGLE]Jungles[\LINK]. If an [LINK=UNIT_LUMBERJACK]Expert Lumberjack[\LINK] is assigned to this profession, you will receive additional Valuable Wood at no extra cost.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Valuable Wood[COLOR_REVERT] is available in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungles[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taiga[COLOR_REVERT]. If an [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Expert Lumberjack[COLOR_REVERT] is assigned to this profession, you will receive additional [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Valuable Wood[COLOR_REVERT] at no extra cost.

TEXT.English: In the [LINK=BUILDING_BREWERS_HOUSE]Brewer's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades, you can make colonists work as [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Brewers[COLOR_REVERT], and have them brew [LINK=YIELD_BEER]Beer[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_BARLEY]Barley[\LINK]. The output of Beer can be increased greatly by employing [LINK=UNIT_BREWER]Master Brewers[\LINK] for this job.
TEXT.French: In the [LINK=BUILDING_BREWERS_HOUSE]Brewer's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades, you can make colonists work as [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Brewers[COLOR_REVERT], and have them brew [LINK=YIELD_BEER]Beer[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_BARLEY]Barley[\LINK]. The output of Beer can be increased greatly by employing [LINK=UNIT_BREWER]Master Brewers[\LINK] for this job.
TEXT.German: Bierbrauer produzieren [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bier[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gerste[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Bierbrauer[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Brewers brew [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Beer[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Brewers brew [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Beer[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Barley[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: If you have a [LINK=BUILDING_BUTCHERS_HOUSE]Butcher's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades present, you can make colonists work in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Butcher (Cattle)[COLOR_REVERT] profession. They produce [LINK=YIELD_FOOD]Food[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_HIDES]Cowhides[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_CATTLE]Cattle[\LINK]. The output of both of these resources is doubled is you employ a [LINK=UNIT_BUTCHER]Master Butcher[\LINK] for this.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about Food production, see [LINK=CONCEPT_FOOD]Food[\LINK].
TEXT.French: If you have a [LINK=BUILDING_BUTCHERS_HOUSE]Butcher's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades present, you can make colonists work in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Butcher (Cattle)[COLOR_REVERT] profession. The output of both of these resources is doubled is you employ a [LINK=UNIT_BUTCHER]Master Butcher[\LINK] for this.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about Food production, see [LINK=CONCEPT_FOOD]Food[\LINK].

TEXT.Italian: Butchers produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Food[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cattle[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Furniture Makers[COLOR_REVERT] can work in the [LINK=BUILDING_FURNITURE_MAKERS_HOUSE]Cabinet Maker's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades to produce [LINK=YIELD_FURNITURE]Furniture[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_VALUABLE_WOOD]Valuable Wood[\LINK]. [LINK=UNIT_FURNITURE_MAKER]Master Cabinetmakers[\LINK] excel at this craft, and can greatly boost your production of Furniture.

[LINK=UNIT_FURNITURE_MAKER]Master Cabinetmakers[\LINK] excel at this craft, and can greatly boost your production of Furniture.
TEXT.German: Möbelschreiner produzieren teure [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Möbel[COLOR_REVERT] aus [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Edelholz[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Möbelschreiner[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.

TEXT.Spanish: Furniture Makers produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Furniture[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Valuable Wood[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Colonists working in the [LINK=BUILDING_SPICE_TRADER_HOUSE]Spice Trader's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades can work as [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt Traders[COLOR_REVERT], and transform [LINK=YIELD_RAW_SALT]Rock Salt[\LINK] to make [LINK=YIELD_SALT]Salt[\LINK]. Assigning a [LINK=UNIT_SPICE_TRADER]Master Spice Trader[\LINK] to this profession even doubles the output of Salt, as long as enough Rock Salt is available.
TEXT.French: Colonists working in the [LINK=BUILDING_SPICE_TRADER_HOUSE]Spice Trader's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades can work as [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt Traders[COLOR_REVERT], and transform [LINK=YIELD_RAW_SALT]Rock Salt[\LINK] to make [LINK=YIELD_SALT]Salt[\LINK]. Assigning a [LINK=UNIT_SPICE_TRADER]Master Spice Trader[\LINK] to this profession even doubles the output of Salt, as long as enough Rock Salt is available.
TEXT.German: Salzhändler verarbeiten [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Steinsalz[COLOR_REVERT] zu [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gewürzhändler[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Salt Traders refine [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Salt Traders refine [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Stone Salt[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Salt[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Colonists working in the [LINK=BUILDING_TANNERS_HOUSE]Tanner's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades take up the profession of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tanner[COLOR_REVERT], and produce [LINK=YIELD_LEATHER]Leather[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_HIDES]Cowhides[\LINK]. This art is mastered by [LINK=UNIT_TANNER]Master Tanners[\LINK], who produce Leather much quicker than your average colonist, as long as enough Cowhides are present.
TEXT.French: Colonists working in the [LINK=BUILDING_TANNERS_HOUSE]Tanner's House[\LINK] or one of its upgrades take up the profession of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tanner[COLOR_REVERT], and produce [LINK=YIELD_LEATHER]Leather[\LINK] from [LINK=YIELD_HIDES]Cowhides[\LINK]. TEXT.German: Gerber verarbeiten [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rinderhäute[COLOR_REVERT] zu [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leder[COLOR_REVERT]. Dieser Prozess ist noch effektiver, wenn Sie dem Beruf einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meister Gerber[COLOR_REVERT] zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Tanners produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Goods[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: Tanners produce [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leather Goods[COLOR_REVERT] from [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hides[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Taiga
Cod

[BOLD]Strategy:[\BOLD][PARAGRAPH:1][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cod[COLOR_REVERT] lives in the deep [LINK=TERRAIN_OCEAN]Ocean[\LINK].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][PARAGRAPH:1]Cod is the common name for the genus Gadus of demersal fishes. Cod is also used as part of the common name for a number of other fish species. The two most important species of cod are the Atlantic cod, which lives in the colder waters and deeper sea regions throughout the North Atlantic, and the Pacific cod, found in both eastern and western regions of the northern Pacific. Cod is popular as a food with a mild flavour and a dense, flaky white flesh.
TEXT.French: [BOLD]Strategy:[\BOLD][PARAGRAPH:1][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cod[COLOR_REVERT] lives in the deep [LINK=TERRAIN_OCEAN]Ocean[\LINK].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][PARAGRAPH:1]Cod is the common name for the genus Gadus of demersal fishes. Cod is also used as part of the common name for a number of other fish species. The two most important species of cod are the Atlantic cod, which lives in the colder waters and deeper sea regions throughout the North Atlantic, and the Pacific cod, found in both eastern and western regions of the northern Pacific. Cod is popular as a food with a mild flavour and a dense, flaky white flesh.
TEXT.German: [BOLD]Strategie:[\BOLD][PARAGRAPH:1]Vorkommen von [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kabeljau[COLOR_REVERT] sind gelegentlich im tiefen [LINK=TERRAIN_OCEAN]Ozean[\LINK] zu finden.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][BOLD]Hintergrund:[\BOLD][PARAGRAPH:1]Kabeljau ist ein gebräuchlicher name für mehrere Fischarten. Die zwei wichtigsten Spezies sind der Atlantik Kabeljau, der in den kalten und tieferen Regionen des Nordatlantiks vorkommt und der Pazifik Kabeljau, der im nördlichen Pazifik zu finden ist. Kabeljau ist euafgrund seines milden Geschmacks und seimen festen, weissen Fleisch sehr beliebt.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]Cod is the common name for the genus Gadus of demersal fishes. Cod is also used as part of the common name for a number of other fish species. The two most important species of cod are the Atlantic cod, which lives in the colder waters and deeper sea regions throughout the North Atlantic, and the Pacific cod, found in both eastern and western regions of the northern Pacific. Cod is popular as a food with a mild flavour and a dense, flaky white flesh.

The two most important species of cod are the Atlantic cod, which lives in the colder waters and deeper sea regions throughout the North Atlantic, and the Pacific cod, found in both eastern and western regions of the northern Pacific. Cod is popular as a food with a mild flavour and a dense, flaky white flesh.

TEXT.English: Fishing Boat:Fishing Boats

[TAB]The development of fishing boats took place in parallel with the development of boats built for trade and war. Early navigators began to use animal skins or woven fabrics for sails. Affixed to a pole set upright in the boat, these sails gave early boats more range, allowing voyages of exploration. In the 15th century, the Dutch developed a type of sea-going herring drifter that became a blueprint for European fishing boats. During the 17th century, the British developed the dogger, an early type of sailing trawler or longliner, which commonly operated in the North Sea. The dogger takes its name from the Dutch word dogger, meaning a fishing vessel which tows a trawl. Dutch trawling boats were common in the North Sea, and the word dogger was given to the area where they often fished, which became known as the Dogger Bank. Doggers were slow but sturdy, capable of fishing in the rough conditions of the North Sea. Like the herring buss, they were wide-beamed and bluff-bowed, but considerably smaller, about 15 metres long, a maximum beam of 4.5 metres, a draught of 1.5 metres, and displacing about 13 tonnes. They could carry a tonne of bait, three tonnes of salt, half a tonne each of food and firewood for the crew, and return with six tonnes of fish. Decked areas forward and aft probably provided accommodation, storage and a cooking area. An anchor would have allowed extended periods fishing in the same spot, in waters up to 18 metres deep. The dogger would also have carried a small open boat for maintaining lines and rowing ashore.

TEXT.German: [TAB]Die Tätigkeit als Fischer ist bereits für die frühesten menschlichen Gesellschaftsformen der Wildbeuter anzunehmen. Den Beruf des Fischers gibt es oft schon in Gesellschaften mit nur geringer Arbeitsteilung. Er setzt den Besitz und die Beherrschung ganz spezieller Arbeitsmittel wie Fischerboot, Piroge oder Fischkutter sowie von Fischernetzen voraus.

TEXT.English: A [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fishing Boat[COLOR_REVERT] on a water tile with the [LINK=BONUS_HIGH_SEA_FISH]Cod[\LINK], [LINK=BONUS_PEARLS]Shellfish[\LINK], [LINK=BONUS_FISH]Fish[\LINK] or [LINK=BONUS_CRAB]Crabs[\LINK] Resource can be given order to start [LINK=CONCEPT_WHALING]Fishing[\LINK] and gather [LINK=YIELD_FOOD]Food[\LINK] from that resource. Fishing Boats are the only units to which this mission is available.[NEWLINE]Every game turn, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Food[COLOR_REVERT] is harvested and put into the cargo hold. Each Bonus Resource can be harvested by only a single Fishing Boat at a time, and Bonus resources which fall inside a settlement's City Radius, or inside another nation's borders, cannot be harvested.[PARAGRAPH:1][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT] are very weak, and do not stand a chance against other ships and even can even be troubled by Ocean-bound [LINK=CONCEPT_ANIMALS]Wild Animals[\LINK]. They can be built in colonies with a [LINK=BUILDING_DRYDOCK]Dock[\LINK] or one of its upgrades. They are cheap, but they require [LINK=YIELD_ROPE]Ropes[\LINK], [LINK=YIELD_SAILCLOTH]Sailcloth[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_TOOLS]Tools[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]For a comparison of all ships that are available, see [LINK=CONCEPT_SHIPS]Ships[\LINK].

TEXT.German: [TAB]Ein [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fischerboot[COLOR_REVERT] kann auf Ozean Felder mit der Resource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kabejau[COLOR_REVERT] oder anderen Resourcen, wie [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fisch[COLOR_REVERT] oder [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Krabben[COLOR_REVERT] mit dem [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fischfang[COLOR_REVERT] beginnen. Fischerboote sind die einzige Einheit denen dies möglich ist. Jede Runde wird [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fisch[COLOR_REVERT] gefangen und im Frachtraum gelagert. Auf einer Resource kann immer nur ein Fischerboot gleichzeitig mit dem Fang beschäftigt sein.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]A [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fishing Boat[COLOR_REVERT] on an ocean tile with a bonus resource [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cod[COLOR_REVERT] or other kinds ressources like [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fish[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crabs[COLOR_REVERT] can be given order to start [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fishing[COLOR_REVERT]. Fishing boats are the only units to which this mission is available. Every game turn, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fish[COLOR_REVERT] is harvested and put into the cargo hold. Each of these bonus resource can be harvested by only a single fishing boat at a time.

Each of these bonus resource can be harvested by only a single fishing boat at a time.

TEXT.German: Das Schiff %s1_unit hat jetzt so viel Fisch an Bord, wie es fassen kann.
TEXT.Italian: Il vostro %s1_unit è riempito al bordo con il cibo dal mare.
TEXT.Spanish: Su %s1_unit está llena hasta el tope con los alimentos del mar.

[TAB][H1]COCA LEAVES[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Strategy:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coca Leaves[COLOR_REVERT] can be cultivated exclusively on hilly [LINK=TERRAIN_SAVANNAH]Savannah[\LINK] regions with little or no vegetation, by assigning a colonist to the [LINK=PROFESSION_COCA_COLLECTOR]Coca Collector[\LINK] profession. The yield will be higher when the [LINK=BONUS_COCA]Coca Plants[\LINK] bonus is present, and can also be increased by constructing [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_COLLECTORS_POST2]Coca Posts[\LINK], and by employing [LINK=UNIT_COCA_COLLECTOR]Expert Coca Collectors[\LINK], who produce double the amount of Coca Leaves any other colonist would produce. [PARAGRAPH:1]As Coca Leaves, once they are picked, are immediately ready for use, they cannot be converted into manufactured goods, but its price is slightly higher than the price of other raw materials.[PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Coca Leaves can refer to leaves of all four cultivated plants of the Coca family (Erythoxylaceae), native to western South America. In times both ancient and modern, these plants have been highly valued for their psychoactive properties, which can be experienced by chewing the leaves, making coca tea ("Mate de coca") out of it and, in modern times, chemically extracting the psychoactive agents to produce the drug Cocaine. Coca Leaves are an effective remedy against altitude sickness, and bestows upon its consumer a greater tolerance for hunger, thirst and fatigue. Apart from that, coca can be used as an anaesthetic as well, and due to its religious significance in indigenous cultures, many other properties are ascribed to it, some of which are supported by modern science.[PARAGRAPH:1] Coca Leaves have been used for medicinal, nutritional and religious purposes in the Andean region since prehistoric times, possibly as long as 8000 years before present time. It was during this long period that the ancestral coca plant was eventually domesticated, after which it diversified into the four modern species. In the Incan Empire, the plant was thought to have a divine origin, and its leaves were used as offerings, as a method of divination, similar to the reading of tea leaves in the old world, and also as preparation for prayers or religious ceremonies. It eventually spread to a large area, ranging from Colombia in the north to Chile in the south. [PARAGRAPH:2] After the Spanish conquest of the Incan Empire, the use of the leaf was tolerated by the Spanish, as it also enhanced the performance of forced laborers, but its religious use was prohibited, and the Spanish themselves were discouraged from using it. Though it was introduced in Europe in the 16th Century, it did not actually become popular until the 19th Century, when the first cocaine was produced.

Apart from that, coca can be used as an anaesthetic as well, and due to its religious significance in indigenous cultures, many other properties are ascribed to it, some of which are supported by modern science.[PARAGRAPH:1] Coca Leaves have been used for medicinal, nutritional and religious purposes in the Andean region since prehistoric times, possibly as long as 8000 years before present time. It was during this long period that the ancestral coca plant was eventually domesticated, after which it diversified into the four modern species. In the Incan Empire, the plant was thought to have a divine origin, and its leaves were used as offerings, as a method of divination, similar to the reading of tea leaves in the old world, and also as preparation for prayers or religious ceremonies. It eventually spread to a large area, ranging from Colombia in the north to Chile in the south. [PARAGRAPH:2] After the Spanish conquest of the Incan Empire, the use of the leaf was tolerated by the Spanish, as it also enhanced the performance of forced laborers, but its religious use was prohibited, and the Spanish themselves were discouraged from using it. Though it was introduced in Europe in the 16th Century, it did not actually become popular until the 19th Century, when the first cocaine was produced.
TEXT.German: [TAB][H1]Cocablätter[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Strategie:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cocablätter[COLOR_REVERT] können nur auf Hügeln der [LINK=TERRAIN_SAVANNAH]Savanne[\LINK] angebaut werden. Hierfür muss einem Kolonisten der Beruf [LINK=PROFESSION_COCA_COLLECTOR]Cocasammler[\LINK] zugewiesen werden. Ein [LINK=UNIT_COCA_COLLECTOR]Erfahrener Cocasammler[\LINK] ist hierin besonders effektiv. Die höchsten Erträge können auf Felder erzielt werden, auf denen die Bonus Ressource [LINK=BONUS_COCA]Cocapflanzen[\LINK] vorkommt. Durch den Bau von [LINK=IMPROVEMENT_COLLECTORS_POST2]Cocasammelstellen[\LINK] kann der Ertrag weiter erhöht werden.[PARAGRAPH:1]Cocablätter können nicht weiter verarbeitet werden, erzielen aber einen leicht höheren Preis als viele andere Rohstoffe.[PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Hintergrund:[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Der Begriff Cocablätter bezieht sich meist auf Blätter der kultivierten Planzen aus der Familie der Cocapflanzen (Erythoxylaceae), welche im westlichen Teil Südamerikas beheimatet sind. Sowohl in der alten Geschichte, wie auch in der modernen Zeit wurden diese Pflanzen sehr hoch geschätzt, da sie psychoaktive Substanzen beinhalten, die man durch das Kauen der Blätter oder durch den Konsum des daraus aufgebrühten Tees aufnehmen kann. In der heutigen Zeit, wird aus diesen Blättern auch die Droge Kokain gewonnen. Weniger bedenkliche Anwirkungen der Cocablätter sind aber beispielsweise die Anwendung in geringeren Mengen als Mittel gegen Höhenkrankheit oder gegen Hungergefühle, Durstgefühle oder Müdigkeit. Ausserdem kann Coca auch zur Betäubung von Schmerzen verwendet werden.[PARAGRAPH:1] Cocablätter wurden jeher in den Regionen der Anden zu relgiösen, medizinischen und nahrungsergänzenden Zwecken eingesetzt. Wahrscheinlich sogar weit länger als 8000 Jahre. In dieser langen Zeitperiode wurde die Cocapflanze irgendwann domestiziert. Heutzutage wird sie in vier unterschiedlichen Gattungen bzw. Unterarten gezüchtet. Das Imperium der Inkas glaubte an einen göttlichen Ursprung der Planze und verwendeten die Blätter als Opfergaben, aber auch als Mittel um die Zukunft voherzusagen oder einfach nur um Gebete und Zeremonien vorzubereiten. Die Pflanze breitete sich schliesslich über ein sehr grosses Gebiet von Kolumbien im Norden bis Chile im Süden aus. [PARAGRAPH:2] Nach der spanischen Eroberung des Inkareiches wurde die Einnahme der Pflanze weiterhin von den Spaniern toleriert, da sie die Leistung der Zwangsarbeiter steigerte. Die religiöse Verwendung der Pflanze wurde aber verboten. Den Spaniern selbst wurde davon abgeraten die Blätter zu konsumieren. Obwohlb bereits im 16ten Jahrhundert Cocablätter in Europa bekannt waren, erlangten diese dort zu dieser Zeit nie Beliebtheit. Dies änderte sich erst als im 19ten Jahrhundert Kokain entdeckt wurde.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB][H1]COCA LEAVES[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][LINK=YIELD_COCA_LEAVES]Coca Leaves[\LINK] can refer to leaves of all four cultivated plants of the Coca family (Erythoxylaceae), native to western South America. In times both ancient and modern, these plants have been highly valued for their psychoactive properties, which can be experienced by chewing the leaves, making coca tea ("Mate de coca") out of it and, in modern times, chemically extracting the psychoactive agents to produce the drug Cocaine. Coca Leaves are an effective remedy against altitude sickness, and bestows upon its consumer a greater tolerance for hunger, thirst and fatigue. Apart from that, coca can be used as an anaesthetic as well, and due to its religious significance in indigenous cultures, many other properties are ascribed to it, some of which are supported by modern science.[PARAGRAPH:1] Coca Leaves have been used for medicinal, nutritional and religious purposes in the Andean region since prehistoric times, possibly as long as 8000 years before present time. It was during this long period that the ancestral coca plant was eventually domesticated, after which it diversified into the four modern species. In the Incan Empire, the plant was thought to have a divine origin, and its leaves were used as offerings, as a method of divination, similar to the reading of tea leaves in the old world, and also as preparation for prayers or religious ceremonies. It eventually spread to a large area, ranging from Colombia in the north to Chile in the south. [PARAGRAPH:2] After the Spanish conquest of the Incan Empire, the use of the leaf was tolerated by the Spanish, as it also enhanced the performance of forced laborers, but its religious use was prohibited, and the Spanish themselves were discouraged from using it. Though it was introduced in Europe in the 16th Century, it did not actually become popular until the 19th Century, when the first cocaine was produced.
